T07TD4090.2E:35a-12: mthong ba la ni 'pho ba med //
T07TD4090.2E:35a-13: mthong ba'i lam las gzhan pa la dbang po 'pho ba yod kyi sbyor ba mi srid pa'i phyir mthong ba'i lam la ni ma yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:35a-14: la la ni so so'i skye bo'i gnas skabs na dbang po rnams 'pho'o //
T07TD4090.2E:35a-15: la la ni dad pas mos pa'i gnas skabs na'o //
T07TD4090.2E:35a-17: 'dis mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa lhag pa'i sems las byung ba bzhi thob pa gang dag yin pa de las gang yang rung ba zhig las 'di yongs su nyams par 'gyur bar ni nga smra'i 'di gcig pus sems kyi rnam par grol ba mi g-yo ba'i bar du lus kyis mngon sum du byas pa gang yin pa de las ni 'di'i rnam grangs gang gis kyang yongs su nyams par 'gyur bar na mi smra'o zhes gang gsungs pa yang ji ltar na ma g-yo ba'i chos can mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa dag las yongs su nyams par 'gyur zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:35a-18: thob dang ma thob nyer spyad las //
T07TD4090.2E:35a-19: yongs nyams rnam pa gsum shes bya //
T07TD4090.2E:35a-20: gal te yon tan thob pa las yongs su nyams na thob pa las yongs su nyams pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:35b-0: gal te yon tan thob par bya ba ma thob na ma thob pa las yongs su @35b nyams pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:35b-1: gal te yon tan thob pa mngon sum du mi byed na nye bar spyod pa las yongs su nyams pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:35b-2: yongs su nyams pa 'di rnams las //
T07TD4090.2E:35b-3: ston pa tha ma mi g-yo la //
T07TD4090.2E:35b-4: bar ma 'ang gzhan la rnam gsum mo //
T07TD4090.2E:35b-5: sangs rgyas lan nye bar spyad pa las yongs su nyams pa kho na mnga'i gzhan ni mi mnga'o //
T07TD4090.2E:35b-6: mi g-yo ba'i chos can la ni de dang ma thob pa las yongs su nyams pa yang yod de /
T07TD4090.2E:35b-7: gang zag khyad par can gyi chos ma thob pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:35b-8: dgra bcom pa gzhan la ni thob pa las yongs su nyams pa yang yod do //
T07TD4090.2E:35b-9: de'i phyir mi g-yo ba'i chos can nye bar spyad pa las yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba'i phyir mdo dang mi 'gal lo //
T07TD4090.2E:35b-10: yongs su mi nyams par smra ba na re thams cad kyi rnam par grol ba zag pa med pa ni mi g-yo ba yin la /
T07TD4090.2E:35b-11: mi g-yo ba'i chos can du ji ltar rnam par gzhag pa ni de bzhin du bshad zin pa de'i phyir 'di ni klan kar mi rung ngo zhes zer ro //
T07TD4090.2E:35b-12: yang gang zhig dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu las yongs su nyams na ci de yang skye 'am zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:35b-13: de lta bu ni med de /
T07TD4090.2E:35b-16: 'bras bu las yongs su nyams pa ni 'ga' yang 'chi ba med de /
T07TD4090.2E:35b-18: dge slong dag 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa la dran pa nyams pa chung du 'byung mod kyi 'on kyang yang myur ba kho nar nub pa dang yongs su zad pa dang yongs su gtugs par 'gyur ro zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:35b-19: de lta ma yin na tshangs par spyod pa yid brtan du mi rung bar 'gyur ro //
T07TD4090.2E:35b-20: 'bras bu gang zhig las yongs su nyams pa ni 'bras bu de la gnas pas bya ba ma yin pa gang yin pa'i /
T07TD4090.2E:35b-21: bya ba ma yin de mi byed //
T07TD4090.2E:35b-22: yongs su nyams kyang 'bras bu de dang 'gal ba'i bya ba mi byed de /
T07TD4090.2E:35b-23: rtsal po che bred pa rdeg mi 'cha' ba bzhin no //
T07TD4090.2E:35b-24: yang dbang po rnams 'pho ba la bar chad med pa dang rnam par grol ba'i lam du dag cig skye zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:35b-25: mi g-yo rnam grol bar chad med //
T07TD4090.2E:35b-27: rtogs pa'i skal ba can zhig mi g-yo ba'i rigs can rtogs par byed na bar chad med pa'i lam dgu dang /
T07TD4090.2E:35b-28: rnam par grol ba'i lam dgu skye ste /
T07TD4090.2E:35b-29: dper na dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa bzhin no //
T07TD4090.2E:36a-0: @36a * // dbang po rtul po'i rigs de shin tu brten phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:36a-1: des dbang po rtul po'i rigs de shin tu goms par byas pa yin pas 'bad pa chung dus bzlog par mi nus te /
T07TD4090.2E:36a-2: slob pa dang mi slob pa'i lam dag gis brtan por byas pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:36a-3: mthong bas thob la re re'o //
T07TD4090.2E:36a-4: mthong bas thob pa rtogs par byed na bar chad med pa'i lam gcig kho na dang rnam par grol ba'i lam gcig kho na skye'o //
T07TD4090.2E:36a-5: sbyor ba'i lam ni thams cad du gcig kho na yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:36a-6: bar chad med pa dang rnam par grol ba'i lam de dag thams cad ni /
T07TD4090.2E:36a-8: 'phags pa rnams kyi dbang po ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i lam gyis 'pho ba med do //
T07TD4090.2E:36a-9: dbang po rnams gang du 'pho zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:36a-11: mi rnams kyi nang kho nar dbang po 'pho'i gzhan du ni ma yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:36a-12: yongs su nyams pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:36a-13: gang zhig sa gang la brten nas dbang po rnams 'pho bar byed ce na /
T07TD4090.2E:36a-14: mi slob pa dgu la brten te /
T07TD4090.2E:36a-15: mi lcogs pa med pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:36a-16: bsam gtan khyad par can dang /
T07TD4090.2E:36a-18: gzugs med pa gsum pa la'o //
T07TD4090.2E:36a-20: gzugs med pa rnams ma gtogs so //
T07TD4090.2E:36a-25: dbang po rnams 'pho ba na dbang bo rtul po'i lam gyi 'bras bu dang 'bras bu khyad par can btang ste dbang po rnon po'i rigs kyi lam gyi 'bras bu kho na 'thob par 'gyur na /
T07TD4090.2E:36a-26: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gzugs med pas bsdus pa ni med do zhes bya ba 'di ni gtan tshigs yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:36a-27: dgra bcom pa 'di dag thams cad ni dbang po'i bye brag las dgu kho na yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:36a-28: ji ltar byas pas shi na /
T07TD4090.2E:36a-29: sangs rgyas gnyis dang nyan thos bdun //
T07TD4090.2E:36a-30: de dgu dbang po rnam dgu can //
T07TD4090.2E:36a-31: nyan thos bdun gang zhe na //
T07TD4090.2E:36a-32: yongs su nyams pa'i chos can la sogs pa lnga dang /
T07TD4090.2E:36a-33: mi g-yo ba'i chos can rnam pa gnyis te /
T07TD4090.2E:36a-34: sbyangs pa las gyur pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:36a-35: dang po nas de'i rigs can no //
T07TD4090.2E:36a-36: sangs rgyas gnyis ni mi g-yo ba'i bye brag kho na yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:36b-0: de @36b ltar na de dag ni chung ngu'i chung ngu la sogs pa dbang po rnam ba dgu'i bye brag gis gang zag dgu yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:36b-1: 'phags pa'i gang zag rnams ni thams cad du bdun yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:36b-2: dad pas rjes su 'brang ba dang /
T07TD4090.2E:36b-3: chos kyis rjes su 'brang ba dang /
T07TD4090.2E:36b-6: lus kyis mngon sum du byed pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:36b-7: shes rab kyis rnam par grol ba dang /
T07TD4090.2E:36b-8: gnyi ga'i cha las rnam par grol ba'o //
T07TD4090.2E:36b-9: gang zag bdun po de dag kyang sbyor ba dang /
T07TD4090.2E:36b-10: dbang po snyoms 'jug rnam grol dang //
T07TD4090.2E:36b-12: sbyor ba las ni dad pas rjes su 'brang ba dang /
T07TD4090.2E:36b-13: chos kyis rjes su 'brang ba dag ste /
T07TD4090.2E:36b-14: dang po nyid nas gzhan gyi dring 'jog pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:36b-15: chos kyis rjes su 'brang ba dag gis don rnams la sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:36b-16: dbang po las ni dad pas mos pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:36b-17: mthong bas thob pa dag ste /
T07TD4090.2E:36b-18: dad pas mos pa dang shes rab lhag pa'i sgo nas dbang po rtul po dang rnon po yin pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:36b-19: snyoms par 'jug pa las ni lus kyis mngon sum du byed pa ste /
T07TD4090.2E:36b-20: 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa mngon sum du byed pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:36b-21: rnam par grol ba las ni shes rab kyis rnam par grol ba'o //
T07TD4090.2E:36b-22: snyoms par 'jug pa dang rnam par grol ba las ni gnyi ga'i cha las rnam par grol ba'o //
T07TD4090.2E:36b-23: ming gi sgo nas ni gang zag de bdun yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:36b-24: de dag drug / rdzas su ni de dag drug yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:36b-25: 'di ltar lam gsum la gnyis gnyis /
T07TD4090.2E:36b-26: mthong ba'i lam la gang zag gnyis te /
T07TD4090.2E:36b-27: dad pas rjes su 'brang ba dang /
T07TD4090.2E:36b-28: chos kyis rjes su 'brang ba dag go //
T07TD4090.2E:36b-29: de dag nyid bsgom pa'i lam la gnyis te /
T07TD4090.2E:36b-31: mthong bas thob pa dag go //
T07TD4090.2E:36b-32: de gnyis kyang mi slob pa'i lam la gnyis yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:36b-33: dus kyis rnam par grol ba dang //
T07TD4090.2E:36b-34: dus dang mi sbyor bar rnam par grol ba dag go //
T07TD4090.2E:36b-35: de la dad pas rjes 'brang ba dbang po'i sgo nas ni gsum mo //
T07TD4090.2E:36b-36: rigs kyi sgo nas ni lnga'o //
T07TD4090.2E:36b-37: lam gyi sgo nas bco lnga ste /
T07TD4090.2E:36b-38: bzod pa brgyad dang shes pa bdun la gnas pa'o //
T07TD4090.2E:36b-39: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sgo nas ni bdun cu rtsa gsum ste /
T07TD4090.2E:37a-1: mtha' dag dang ldan pa dang 'dod pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir dgu nas de bzhin du ci yang med pa'i skye mched las 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir gyi bar du'o //
T07TD4090.2E:37a-2: rten gyi sgo nas ni dgu ste /
T07TD4090.2E:37a-3: gling gsum dang lha'i ris drug tu skyes pa'o //
T07TD4090.2E:37a-4: dbang po dang rigs dang lam dang 'dod chags dang bral ba dang rten gyi sgo nas bsdoms na ni /
T07TD4090.2E:37a-5: 'bum bzhi khri bdun stong brgyad brgya nyi shu rtsa lngar 'gyur te /
T07TD4090.2E:37a-6: gang zag gzhan dag kyang ci rigs par de bzhin du brtsi bar bya'o //
T07TD4090.2E:37a-7: gnyi ga'i cha las rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba 'di ni gang /
T07TD4090.2E:37a-8: shes rab kyis rnam par grol ba ni gang zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:37a-9: 'gog thob gnyi ga las rnam grol //
T07TD4090.2E:37a-10: shes rab kyis ni cig shos so //
T07TD4090.2E:37a-11: gang 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa thob pa de ni gnyi ga'i cha las rnam par grol ba yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:37a-12: shes rab dang ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dag gis nyon mongs pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:37a-13: snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgrib pa las rnam par grol ba'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:37a-14: cig shos ni shes rab kyis rnam par grol ba yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:37a-15: shes rab kyi stobs kyis nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa 'ba' zhig las rnam par grol ba'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:37a-17: 'di la gang zhig nyon mongs lnga spangs te //
T07TD4090.2E:37a-18: mi 'phrogs chos ldan slob pa yongs su rdzogs //
T07TD4090.2E:37a-20: ji tsam gyis na slob pa yongs su rdzogs pa yin zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:37a-22: slob pa yongs rdzogs zhes bya'o //
T07TD4090.2E:37a-23: slob pa yongs su rdzogs pa ni rnam pa gsum ste /
T07TD4090.2E:37a-27: phyir mi 'ong ba dad pas mos pa lus kyis mngon sum du byed pa ma yin pa ni 'bras bu kho na las so //
T07TD4090.2E:37a-28: mthong bas thob pa 'dod chags dang ma bral ba ni dbang po kho na las so //
T07TD4090.2E:37a-29: phyir mi 'ong ba mthong bas thob pa lus kyis mngon sum du byed pa ma yin pa ni 'bras bu dang dbang po las so //
T07TD4090.2E:37a-30: dad pas mos pa lus kyis mngon sum du byed pa ni 'bras bu dang snyoms par 'jug pa kho na las so //
T07TD4090.2E:37a-31: mthong bas thob pa lus kyis mngon sum du byed pa ni 'bras bu dang /
T07TD4090.2E:37b-1: snyoms par 'jug pa kho na dang /
T07TD4090.2E:37b-3: dbang po las yongs su rdzogs pa nyid ni mad do //
T07TD4090.2E:37b-4: gnyis kyis mi slob yongs su rdzogs //
T07TD4090.2E:37b-5: dbang po dang snyoms par 'jug pa las so //
T07TD4090.2E:37b-6: 'bras bu yongs su ma rdzogs pa la ni mi slob pa nyid kyang med pa kho na yin pas 'di'i 'bras bu rdzogs pa ni yongs su rdzogs pa nyid du rnam par ma bzhag go //
T07TD4090.2E:37b-7: shes rab kyis rnam par grol ba dus dang mi sbyor bar rnam par grol ba ni dbang po kho na las so //
T07TD4090.2E:37b-8: gnyi ga'i cha las rnam par grol ba dus kyis rnam par grol ba ni snyoms par 'jug pa kho na las so //
T07TD4090.2E:37b-9: gnyi ga'i cha las rnam par grol ba dus dang mi sbyor bar rnam par grol ba ni dbang po dang snyoms par 'jug pa dag las so //
T07TD4090.2E:37b-10: 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:37b-11: mthong ba dang bsgom pa dang mi slob pa'i lam rnams dang /
T07TD4090.2E:37b-13: bar chad med pa dang rnam par grol ba'i lam dang khyad par can gyi lam rnams zhes bya ba lam gyi bye brag mang po zhig bshad pa de dag mdor bsdu na lam rnam pa du zhig yin zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:37b-14: mdor na lam ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
T07TD4090.2E:37b-15: khyad par can dang rnam grol dang //
T07TD4090.2E:37b-16: bar chad med dang sbyor zhes bya //
T07TD4090.2E:37b-17: sbyor ba'i lam ni gang gi mjug thogs su bar chad med pa'i lam skye ba'o //
T07TD4090.2E:37b-18: bar chad med pa'i lam ni gang gis sgrib pa rab tu spong ba'o //
T07TD4090.2E:37b-19: rnam par grol ba'i lam ni des spang bar bya ba'i sgrib pa las nges par grol pa dang po nyid du skye ba gang yin pa'o //
T07TD4090.2E:37b-20: khyad par can gyi lam ni de dag las gzhan pa'i lam gang yin pa'o //
T07TD4090.2E:37b-21: ci'i phyir lam zhes bya zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:37b-22: de nas der 'gro ba'i phyir ram /
T07TD4090.2E:37b-23: 'dis mya ngan las 'das pa tshol ba'i phyir 'di ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:37b-24: rnam par grol ba dang khyad par can gyi lam dag ji ltar na lam nyid yin zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:37b-26: ches che ba yin pa'i phyir te /
T07TD4090.2E:37b-27: gong nas gong du phyin par byed pa'i phyir ram /
T07TD4090.2E:37b-28: phung po'i lhag ma ma lus par 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:37b-29: yang lam nyid mya ngan las 'das pa sgrub par byed pa'i phyir sgrub pa zhes gsungs so //
T07TD4090.2E:38a-0: mngon par shes pa bul la dka' ba'i @38a * //
T07TD4090.2E:38a-2: mngon par shes pa myur la dka' ba'i lam yang yod de /
T07TD4090.2E:38a-3: de bzhin du sla ba yang rnam pa gnyis so //
T07TD4090.2E:38a-5: bsam gtan dag gi lam rnams sla //
T07TD4090.2E:38a-6: bsam gtan bzhi'i lam ni sla ba yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:38a-7: yan lag gis yongs su zin pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:38a-8: zhi gnas dang lhag mthong mnyam pa dag gis 'bad mi dgos par rang gi dang gis 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:38a-9: sa gzhan dag gi dka' ba yin //
T07TD4090.2E:38a-10: mi lcogs pa med pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:38a-11: bsam gtan khyad par can dang /
T07TD4090.2E:38a-12: gzugs med pa rnams kyi lam ni /
T07TD4090.2E:38a-13: yan lag gis yongs su ma zin pa'i phyir dang /
T07TD4090.2E:38a-14: zhi gnas dang lhag mthong chung ba'i phyir lam dka' ba yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:38a-15: mi lcogs pa med pa dang bsam gtan khyad par can na ni zhi gnas chung ngo //
T07TD4090.2E:38a-16: gzugs med pa dag na ni lhag mthong chung ngo //
T07TD4090.2E:38a-17: lam de yang rnam pa gnyis te /
T07TD4090.2E:38a-18: blo rtul mngon shes bul ba ste //
T07TD4090.2E:38a-19: cig shos kyi ni mngon shes myur //
T07TD4090.2E:38a-20: dbang po rtul po ni lam sla ba 'am dka' ba yang rung ste /
T07TD4090.2E:38a-21: mngon par shes pa bul ba yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:38a-22: dbang po rnon po ni mngon par shes pa myur ba yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:38a-23: lam nyid la mngon par shes pa bul ba yod pas na 'di ni mngon par shes pa bul ba ste /
T07TD4090.2E:38a-24: mngon par shes pa myur ba yang de dang 'dra'o //
T07TD4090.2E:38a-25: yang na 'di gang zag dbang po rtul po'i yin pas mngon par shes pa bul ba yin la /
T07TD4090.2E:38a-26: yid rnon po'i yin pas mngon par shes pa myur ba'o //
T07TD4090.2E:38a-27: lam 'di ni byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa zhes bya ba'i ming 'thob ste /
T07TD4090.2E:38a-28: byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa sum cu rtsa bdun ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /
T07TD4090.2E:38a-29: yang dag par sbong ba zhi dang /
T07TD4090.2E:38a-30: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /
T07TD4090.2E:38a-33: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /
T07TD4090.2E:38a-34: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad do //
T07TD4090.2E:38a-35: de la zad dang mi skye shes pa ni /
T07TD4090.2E:38a-36: byang chub zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pa na gang zag gi bye brag gis nyan thos kyi byang chub dang /
T07TD4090.2E:38a-37: rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang /
T07TD4090.2E:38a-38: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang /
T07TD4090.2E:38a-39: byang chub gsum zhes bya ste /
T07TD4090.2E:38a-40: de gnyis kyis ma rig pa ma lus par spangs pa'i phyir dang /
T07TD4090.2E:38a-41: rang gi don byas pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:38b-0: yang @38b byar med pa nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:38b-2: sum cu rtsa bdun de'i phyogs mthun //
T07TD4090.2E:38b-3: byang chub dang mthun pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:38b-5: byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa sum cu rtsa bdun zhes bya'o //
T07TD4090.2E:38b-7: byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa thams cad ni rdzas su bcu ste /
T07TD4090.2E:38b-9: dad dang brtson 'grus dran pa dang //
T07TD4090.2E:38b-10: shes rab ting 'dzin btang snyoms dga' //
T07TD4090.2E:38b-11: rtog dang tshul khrims shin tu sbyangs //
T07TD4090.2E:38b-12: de ltar byas na de dag ni rdzas su bcu'o //
T07TD4090.2E:38b-14: dran pa nyer gzhag shes rab ste ;
T07TD4090.2E:38b-17: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:38b-18: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni shes rab dang /
T07TD4090.2E:38b-20: ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin dag yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:38b-21: de'i phyir re zhig dbang po dang stobs rnams ni ming gis smos pa dad pa dang brtson 'grus dang dran pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab kyi rdzas lnga yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:38b-22: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /
T07TD4090.2E:38b-23: chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
T07TD4090.2E:38b-24: yang dag pa'i lta ba ni shes rab kho na yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:38b-25: yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa rnams dang /
T07TD4090.2E:38b-26: brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
T07TD4090.2E:38b-27: yang dag pa'i rtsol ba ni brtson 'grus kho na yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:38b-28: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /
T07TD4090.2E:38b-29: ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
T07TD4090.2E:38b-30: yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni ting nge 'dzin kha na yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:38b-31: dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
T07TD4090.2E:38b-32: yang dag pa'i dran pa ni dran pa kho na yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:38b-36: btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
T07TD4090.2E:38b-37: yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:38b-38: tshul khrims kyi yan lag rnams dang rdzas de lnga ste /
T07TD4090.2E:38b-39: de ltar na byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa de dag ni rdzas bcu yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:38b-40: bye brag tu smra ba rnams kyi ltar na lus dang ngag gi las dag tha dad cing rigs mi mthun pa'i phyir tshul khrims kyi yan lag rnams rdzas gnyis yin pas rdzas bcu gcig yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:39a-0: 'di skad du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa @39a * //
T07TD4090.2E:39a-1: la sogs pa ni shes rab dang brtson 'grus dang /
T07TD4090.2E:39a-2: ting 'dzin gyi rang bzhin dag yin no zhes bshad pa gang yin pa der ni /
T07TD4090.2E:39a-3: gtso bo smos pa yin par rig par bya'o //
T07TD4090.2E:39a-5: sbyor byung yon tan kun kyang yin //
T07TD4090.2E:39a-6: gtso bo smos pas de skad bshad kyi /
T07TD4090.2E:39a-7: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:39a-8: yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:39a-9: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni sbyor ba las byung ba'i yon tan thams cad kyang yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:39a-10: ci'i phyir brtson 'grus la yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa zhes bshad ce na /
T07TD4090.2E:39a-11: des lus dang ngag dang yid yang dag par 'jog pas so //
T07TD4090.2E:39a-12: ci'i phyir ting nge 'dzin la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa zhes bshad ce na /
T07TD4090.2E:39a-13: de ni yon tan thams cad sbyor ba'i rten yin pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:39a-14: gang dag rdzu 'phrul ni ting nge 'dzin kho na yin la /
T07TD4090.2E:39a-15: 'dun pa la sogs pa ni rkang pa yin no zhes zer ba de dag gi ltar na ni 'dun pa dang sems dag lhag pa'i phyir byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa rdzas bcu gsum du 'gyur la /
T07TD4090.2E:39a-16: dge slong dag rdzu 'phrul yang bshad pa rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang bshad do zhes bya ba nas /
T07TD4090.2E:39a-18: 'di na dge slong rdzu 'phrul gyi yul rnam pa du ma nyams su myong bar byed cing /
T07TD4090.2E:39a-19: gcig tu gyur nas mang por 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar rgyas par gsungs pa'i mdo dang yang 'gal lo //
T07TD4090.2E:39a-20: ci'i phyir dbang po rnams kho na yang stobs rnams su bshad ce na /
T07TD4090.2E:39a-21: chung ngu dang chen po'i bye brag gis rdzi ba dang rdzi ba med pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:39a-22: dbang po rnams kyi go rims cis byas she na /
T07TD4090.2E:39a-23: dad par gyur pa ni 'bras bu'i don du brtson 'grus rtsom par byed do //
T07TD4090.2E:39a-24: brtson 'grus brtsams na dran pa nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro //
T07TD4090.2E:39a-25: dran pa nye bar gnas na rnam par mi g-yeng ba'i phyir sems mnyam par 'jog go //
T07TD4090.2E:39a-26: sems mnyam par gzhag na yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes par 'gyur ro //
T07TD4090.2E:39a-27: gnas skabs gang du byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa gang zhig rab tu 'byed can bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re /
T07TD4090.2E:39a-28: sde tshan bdun ni go rigs bzhin //
T07TD4090.2E:39a-29: las ni dang po pa dag dang //
T07TD4090.2E:39a-30: nges 'byed cha mthun rnams dang ni //
T07TD4090.2E:39a-31: bsgom dang mthong la rab tu phye //
T07TD4090.2E:39b-0: las @39b dang po pa'i gnas skabs su ni lus la sogs pa la nye bar brtag pa'i phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so //
T07TD4090.2E:39b-1: khyad par thob pas brtson 'grus yang dag par spel ba'i phyir dro bar gyur pa dag la ni yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa rnams so //
T07TD4090.2E:39b-2: yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba la 'jug pa'i phyir rtse mo dag ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so //
T07TD4090.2E:39b-3: yang yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i sgo nas dbang po thob pa'i phyir bzod pa dag la ni dbang po rnams so //
T07TD4090.2E:39b-4: nyon mongs pa rnams kyis mi brdzi ba'i phyir ram /
T07TD4090.2E:39b-5: 'jig rten pa'i chos can gzhan dag gis mi brdzi ba'i phyir chos kyi mchog dag la ni stobs rnams so //
T07TD4090.2E:39b-6: byang chub dang nye ba'i phyir bsgom pa'i lam dag la ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so //
T07TD4090.2E:39b-7: 'gro bas rab tu phye ba'i phyir mthong ba'i lam la ni lam gyi yan lag rnams te /
T07TD4090.2E:39b-8: de ni myur bar 'gro ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:39b-9: grangs kyi rim pa bzhin du bya ba'i phyir sngar bdun bshad la phyis brgyad bshad do //
T07TD4090.2E:39b-10: de la chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni byang chub kyang yin la byang chub kyi yan lag kyang yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:39b-11: yang dag pa'i lta ba ni lam yang yin la lam gyi yan lag kyang yin no zhes zer ro //
T07TD4090.2E:39b-12: gzhan dag ni go rims ma nyams pa kho nar byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa rnams go rims bzhin du brjod do //
T07TD4090.2E:39b-13: re zhig dang po kho nar yul rnam pa mang po la g-yeng bar 'phro ba'i blo rnams tshar bcad pa'i phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so //
T07TD4090.2E:39b-14: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi po 'di dag ni de'i sems kyi nye bar 'dogs pa yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:39b-16: zhen pa la brten pa'i dran pa'i kun du rtog pa rnams bsal bar bya ba'i phyir zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:39b-17: de'i stobs kyis brtson 'grus yang dag par 'phel bas dgos pa rnam pa bzhi bsgrub pa'i phyir sems yang dag par rab tu 'jog pas na yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa rnams so //
T07TD4090.2E:39b-18: de'i 'og tu ting nge 'dzin rnam par sbyong ba'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so //
T07TD4090.2E:40a-0: ting nge 'dzin la yang dag par brten nas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams kyi bdag @40a * //
T07TD4090.2E:40a-1: por 'gyur ba'i phyir dad pa la sogs pa ni dbang po rnams so //
T07TD4090.2E:40a-2: de dag nyid mi mthun pa'i phyogs kun tu spyod pa las nges par rgyal ba ni stobs rnams so //
T07TD4090.2E:40a-3: mthong ba'i lam la ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams te /
T07TD4090.2E:40a-4: dang po nyid du chos kyi de kho na rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:40a-5: gnyi ga la ni lam gyi yan lag rnams te /
T07TD4090.2E:40a-6: 'di ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur na /
T07TD4090.2E:40a-7: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba rnams byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi bar du bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so //
T07TD4090.2E:40a-8: yang dge slong yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin gyi tshig brjod pa zhes bya ba 'di ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i tshig bla dags yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:40a-9: dge slong ji ltar rtogs pa'i lam gyis 'jug ces bya ba 'di ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad kyi tshig bla dags yin no zhes gsungs so //
T07TD4090.2E:40a-10: de lta bas na gnyi ga la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad 'dod par bya dgos pas go rims grub pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:40a-11: byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa du zhig ni zag pa dang bcas pa dag yin /
T07TD4090.2E:40a-12: du zhig ni zag pa med pa dag yin zhes bya ba 'di brjod par bya ste /
T07TD4090.2E:40a-13: byang chub yan lag lam yan lag / zag pa med /
T07TD4090.2E:40a-14: de gnyis ni bsgom pa'i lam dang mthong ba'i lam la rnam par gzhag pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:40a-15: 'jig rten pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba la sogs pa yang yod mod kyi /
T07TD4090.2E:40a-16: de dag ni 'phags pa'i lam zhes bya ba'i sgra mi 'thob po //
T07TD4090.2E:40a-18: byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa gzhan dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa yang yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:40a-19: sa gang na byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa du zhig yod ce na bsam gtan dang po na thams cad /
T07TD4090.2E:40a-20: bsam gtan dang po na sum cu rtsa bdun po thams cad yod do //
T07TD4090.2E:40a-21: mi lcogs med na dga' ma gtogs //
T07TD4090.2E:40a-22: ci'i phyir mi lcogs pa med pa na dga' ba med ce na /
T07TD4090.2E:40a-23: nyer bsdogs rnams ni stobs kyis drang dgos pa'i phyir dang /
T07TD4090.2E:40a-24: sa 'og ma'i dogs pa dang bcas pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:40a-25: gnyis pa na ni rtog ma gtogs //
T07TD4090.2E:40b-0: bsam gtan gnyis pa na ni yang dag @40b pa'i rtog pa ma gtogs pa sum cu rtsa drug kho na yod de /
T07TD4090.2E:40b-1: de na rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:40b-2: gnyis na de gnyis ma gtogs pa /
T07TD4090.2E:40b-3: bsam gtan gsum pa dang bzhi pa dag na ni dga' ba dang rtog pa dag ma gtogs pa sum cu rtsa lnga yod do //
T07TD4090.2E:40b-5: de gnyis nyid ma gtogs pa sum cu rtsa lnga kho na yod do //
T07TD4090.2E:40b-7: gsum na'ang de dang mtshungs yan lag / ma gtogs zhes bya bar sbyar te /
T07TD4090.2E:40b-8: gzugs med pa dag na ni yang dag pa'i ngag dang /
T07TD4090.2E:40b-12: rtog pa dag ma gtogs pa sum cu rtsa gnyis yod do //
T07TD4090.2E:40b-13: byang chub dang ni lam yan lag / ma gtogs 'dod khams srid rtse na //
T07TD4090.2E:40b-14: de gnyis ni zag pa med pa'i lam med pa'i phyir byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis yod do //
T07TD4090.2E:40b-15: byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa rnams la gnas pa gnas skabs gang du shes nas dad pa 'thob par rig par bya zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:40b-16: bden gsum mthong na tshul khrims dang //
T07TD4090.2E:40b-17: chos la shes nas dad pa 'thob //
T07TD4090.2E:40b-18: lam mngon rtogs na sangs rgyas dang //
T07TD4090.2E:40b-19: de yi dge 'dun dag la yang //
T07TD4090.2E:40b-20: sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba dang 'gog pa'i bden pa rnams mngon par rtogs na chos la shes nas dad pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:40b-21: 'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims rnams 'thob bo //
T07TD4090.2E:40b-22: lam gyi bden pa mngon par rtogs na sangs rgyas dang /
T07TD4090.2E:40b-23: de'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun la shes nas dad pa 'thob ste /
T07TD4090.2E:40b-24: gang zhig de gnyis la dad pa de ni sangs rgyas su byed pa'i chos mi slob pa rnams dang /
T07TD4090.2E:40b-25: dge 'dun du byed pa'i chos slob pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:40b-26: mi slob pa rnams la dad pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:40b-27: yang zhes bya ba'i sgras ni tshul khrims dang chos la shes nas dad pa dag kyang 'thob par ston to //
T07TD4090.2E:40b-28: 'dir gang la chos su dgongs pa yin zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:40b-29: chos bden gsum dang rang sangs rgyas //
T07TD4090.2E:40b-30: byang chub sems dpa'i lam yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:40b-31: de'i phyir bden pa bzhi char yang mngon par rtogs na chos la shes nas dad pa 'thob po //
T07TD4090.2E:40b-32: de dag ni dad pa'i gzhi'i bye brag las ming gi sgo nas shes nas dad pa bzhi zhes bya ba'o //
T07TD4090.2E:41a-3: sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la shes nas dad pa rnams ni dad pa'i rang bzhin dag yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:41a-4: 'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims rnams ni tshul khrims yin pas rdzas gnyis so //
T07TD4090.2E:41a-5: ci 'di dag zag pa dang bcas pa dag cig gam zag pa med pa dag cig yin zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:41a-6: shes nas dad pa rnams ni gcig tu /
T07TD4090.2E:41a-8: shes nas dad pa zhes bya ba'i don ci zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:41a-9: bden pa rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rtogs nas yid ches pa ni shes nas dad pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:41a-10: 'di dag gi rim pa ni langs nas ji ltar mngon sum du byed pa de bzhin du bkod do //
T07TD4090.2E:41a-11: langs nas ji ltar mngon sum byed ce na /
T07TD4090.2E:41a-12: kye ma bcom ldan 'das ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:41a-13: de'i chos 'dul ba ni legs par gsungs pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:41a-14: de'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni legs par zhugs pa yin no zhes bya bar mngon sum du byed de /
T07TD4090.2E:41a-15: sman pa dang sman dang nad g-yog lta bur gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:41a-16: sems rab tu dang bas byas pa'i tshul khrims kyang rab tu dang ba yin pas tha mar bzhi pa bshad de /
T07TD4090.2E:41a-17: 'di ni de ltar rab tu dang bar gyur pa'i sgrub pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:41a-18: yang na nad med pa lta bur gyur pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:41a-19: yang na ston par byed pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:41a-22: bzhon pa lta bu yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:41a-23: mdo las slob pa ni yan lag brgyad dang ldan no //
T07TD4090.2E:41a-24: mi slob pa ni yan lag bcu dang ldan no zhes gsungs pa /
T07TD4090.2E:41a-25: ci'i phyir slob pa la yang dag pa'i rnam par grol ba dang /
T07TD4090.2E:41a-26: yang dag pa'i shes pa ma bshad ce na /
T07TD4090.2E:41a-27: bcings phyir slob pa'i yan lag tu //
T07TD4090.2E:41a-29: slob pa ni da dung nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba rnams kyis bcings pa yin pas bcings bzhin du ji ltar rnam par grol bar rnam par gzhag ste 'ching ba'i phyogs gcig las grol bas ni grol zhes mi bya'o //
T07TD4090.2E:41a-30: rnam par grol ba med par yang ji ltar rnam par grol ba'i shes pa rnam par gzhag / mi slob pa ni nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba thams cad las gtan du nges par thar pa'i phyir rnam par grol ba dang /
T07TD4090.2E:41b-0: de so so rang gi shes @41b pa dag gis rab tu phye ba yin pas de kho na la de smos pa rig pa dang ldan pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:41b-1: rnam par grol zhes bya ba 'di ci zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:41b-5: nyon mongs bcom pa 'dus ma byas //
T07TD4090.2E:41b-6: mos pa 'dus byas nyon mongs pa spangs pa ni rnam par grol ba 'dus ma byas yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:41b-7: mi slob pa'i mos pa ni rnam par grol ba 'dus byas yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:41b-9: rnam par grol ba 'dus byas de ni mi slob pa'i yan lag tu bshad de /
T07TD4090.2E:41b-10: yan lag rnams ni 'dus byas yin pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:41b-12: rnam par grol ba 'dus byas de nyid mdo las /
T07TD4090.2E:41b-13: sems rnam par grol ba dang /
T07TD4090.2E:41b-14: shes rab rnam par grol ba dang /
T07TD4090.2E:41b-15: rnam par grol ba gnyis su gsungs te /
T07TD4090.2E:41b-16: de nyid rnam par grol ba'i phung po yin par yang blta'o //
T07TD4090.2E:41b-17: gzhan dag na re mdo las /
T07TD4090.2E:41b-18: stag gi byang chub kyi bu dag rnam par grol ba yongs su dag pa gtso bo gang yin zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:41b-19: 'di na dge slong 'dod chags las sems 'dod chags dang bral zhing rnam par grol ba yin /
T07TD4090.2E:41b-20: zhe sdang dang gti mug las sems 'dod chags dang bral zhing rnam par grol ba yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:41b-21: 'di ltar rnam par grol ba'i phung po yongs su ma rdzogs pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa 'am /
T07TD4090.2E:41b-22: yongs su rdzogs pa rjes su 'dzin par byed pa 'dun pa dang brtson 'grus gang yin pa zhes rgyas par gang gsungs pa ji lta bu /
T07TD4090.2E:41b-23: de'i phyir rnam par grol ba ni mos pa kho na yin par ma zad do //
T07TD4090.2E:41b-25: de kho na shes pas 'dod chags la sogs pa spangs nas sems dri ma med pa nyid rnam par grol ba yin no zhes zer ro //
T07TD4090.2E:41b-26: yang dag pa'i rnam par grol ba bshad zin to //
T07TD4090.2E:41b-27: yang dag pa'i lta ba las ma gtogs pa yang dag pa'i shes pa gang zhig yin zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:41b-28: byang chub ji skad bshad shes pa /
T07TD4090.2E:41b-29: sngar byang chub ji skad du bshad pa gang yin pa de nyid 'dir yang dag pa'i shes pa yin par rig par bya ste /
T07TD4090.2E:41b-31: zad pa shes pa dang mi skye ba shes pa'o //
T07TD4090.2E:41b-32: sems gang zhig rnam par grol bar 'gyur /
T07TD4090.2E:41b-33: ci 'das pa 'am ma 'ongs pa 'am da ltar byung ba yin zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:41b-34: mi slob sems ni skye 'gyur ba //
T07TD4090.2E:41b-35: sgrib pa las ni rnam grol 'gyur //
T07TD4090.2E:42a-0: @42a * // bstan bcos las mi slob pa'i sems ma 'ongs pa sgrib pa rnam las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro zhes 'byung ngo //
T07TD4090.2E:42a-1: de'i sgrib pa yang gang zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:42a-2: nyon mongs pa'i thob pa yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:42a-3: de skye ba la bgegs byed pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:42a-4: rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi tshe de yang slong bar 'gyur la mi slob pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur ba de yang rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro //
T07TD4090.2E:42a-5: de spangs nas ni mi slob pa'i sems de yang skyes pa dang rnam par grol ba yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:42a-6: 'o na skye bar 'gyur ba ma yin pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:42a-7: 'jig rten pa gang yin pa ji lta bu zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:42a-8: de dag kyang rnam par grol bar 'gyur mod kyi skye bar nges pa gang yin pa de kho na bshad do //
T07TD4090.2E:42a-9: gang las 'jig rten pa rnam par grol bar 'gyur zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:42a-10: skye ba'i sgrib pa de nyid las so //
T07TD4090.2E:42a-11: ma grol ba la yang 'jig rten pa'i skye bar 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:42a-14: nyon mongs pa'i thob pa dang lhan cig pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:42a-15: gnas skabs gang yin pa'i lam gyis de skye ba'i sgrib pa spong zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:42a-17: de yi sgrib pa rab tu spong //
T07TD4090.2E:42a-18: de ltar gyi zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T07TD4090.2E:42a-19: rnam par grol ba 'dus ma byas su bshad pa gang yin pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:42a-20: khams gsum po spangs pa'i khams dang /
T07TD4090.2E:42a-21: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i khams dang /
T07TD4090.2E:42a-22: 'gog pa'i khams zhes 'byung ba gang yin de dag la khyad par ci yod ce na /
T07TD4090.2E:42a-23: 'dus ma byas nyid khams zhes bya //
T07TD4090.2E:42a-24: rnam par grol ba 'dus ma byas de nyid khams gsum yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:42a-27: 'dod chags spangs pa ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i khams yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:42a-28: spangs pa'i khams ni gzhan dag go //
T07TD4090.2E:42a-29: yang dag par zad pa zhes bya bar sbyar te /
T07TD4090.2E:42a-30: 'dod chags las gzhan pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams spangs pa ni spangs pa'i khams yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:42a-31: 'gog pa'i khams zhes bya ba gzhi //
T07TD4090.2E:42a-32: yang dag par zad pa zhes bya ba kho nar sbyar te /
T07TD4090.2E:42a-33: nyon mongs pa las ma gtogs pa bzhi spangs pa ni 'gog pa'i khams yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:42b-0: dngos po gang gis yid 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i dngos po @42b des 'dod chags dang bral bar yang 'gyur ram zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:42b-2: ji ltar byas pas she na /
T07TD4090.2E:42b-3: sdug bsngal rgyu bzod shes rnams kyis //
T07TD4090.2E:42b-4: yid 'byung sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung la bzod pa dang shes pa rnams kho nas yid 'byung bar 'gyur gyi gzhan dag gis ni ma yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:42b-7: sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba dang 'gog pa dang lam la bzod pa dang shes pa gang dag gis nyon mongs pa spong bar 'gyur ba thams cad kyis kyang 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
T07TD4090.2E:42b-8: de lta na ni mu bzhi srid ;
T07TD4090.2E:42b-9: de lta na mu bzhir grub ste /
T07TD4090.2E:42b-10: sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung la bzod pa dang shes pa rnams kyis nyon mongs pa dag mi spong na yid 'byung ba kho na yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:42b-11: yid 'byung ba'i dngos po kho na la dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:42b-12: 'gog pa dang lam la bzod pa dang shes pa rnams kyis nyon mongs pa dag spong na 'dod chags dang bral ba kho na yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:42b-13: mchog tu dga' ba'i dngos po la dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:42b-14: snga ma rnams kyis nyon mongs pa dag spong na gnyi ga yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:42b-15: phyi ma rnams kyis nyon mongs bdag mi spong na gnyi ga ma yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:42b-16: de la 'dod chags dang bral ba zhig bden pa rnams la lta na chos shes pa dang bzod pa rnams kyis nyon mongs pa dag mi spong ngo //
T07TD4090.2E:42b-17: shes pa rnams kyis ni sbyor ba dang rnam par grol ba dang khyad par can gyi lam gyis bsdus pa rnams kyis mi spong ngo //
T07TD4090.2E:42b-18: chos mngon pa mdzod kyi bshad pa las lam dang gang zag bstan pa zhes bya ba mdzod kyi gnas drug pa'o /
T07TD4090.2E:42b-22: yang dag pa'i lta ba zhes kyang 'byung /
T07TD4090.2E:42b-23: yang dag pa'i shes pa zhes kyang 'byung na ci bzod pa dag yin la shes pa ma yin nam /
T07TD4090.2E:42b-24: yang dag pa'i shes pa yin la yang dag pa'i lta ba ma yin nam zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:42b-25: dri med bzod rnams shes pa yin //
T07TD4090.2E:42b-26: des spang bar bya ba'i phra rgyas the tshom ma spangs pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:42b-27: de dag yang dag par rtog pa'i bdag nyid can yin pa'i phyir lta ba dag yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:43a-0: ji ltar bzod pa rnams lta ba yin gyi shes pa ma yin @43a * //
T07TD4090.2E:43a-2: zad dang mi skye'i blo lta min //
T07TD4090.2E:43a-3: zad pa shes pa dang mi skye ba shes pa ni yang dag pa'i rtog pa med pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:43a-4: yongs su 'tshol ba'i bsam pa can ma yin pa'i phyir lta ba ma yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:43a-5: de las gzhan 'phags blo gnyi ga / bzod pa dang zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pa dag las gzhan pa zag pa med pa'i shes rab ni lta ba dang shes pa yang yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:43a-6: gzhan shes 'jig rten pa'i shes rab thams cad ni shes pa kho na yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:43a-9: 'jig rten pa'i lta ba yang dag pa'i lta ba ste /
T07TD4090.2E:43a-10: 'jig rten pa'i shes pa rnam pa drug ni lta ba yin gyi gzhan ni lta ba ma yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:43a-11: 'di dag dang gzhan dag kyang shes pa ni ma yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:43a-12: ji snyed cig gis shes pa thams cad bsdus she na /
T07TD4090.2E:43a-14: mdor bsdu na ni gnyis te /
T07TD4090.2E:43a-15: shes pa zag bcas zag pa med //
T07TD4090.2E:43a-17: dang po kun rdzob ces bya'o //
T07TD4090.2E:43a-18: zag pa dang bcas pa gang yin pa de ni phal cher bum pa dang snam bu dang skyes pa dang bud med la sogs pa kun rdzob 'dzin pa'i phyir kun rdzob shes pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:43a-19: zag med rnam gnyis chos dang ni /
T07TD4090.2E:43a-20: rjes su shes pa kho na yin //
T07TD4090.2E:43a-21: zag pa med pa'i shes pa la rnam pa gnyis su dbye ste /
T07TD4090.2E:43a-24: de ltar na shes pa 'di gnyis ni gsum yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:43a-29: kun rdzob yul ni thams cad do //
T07TD4090.2E:43a-30: kun rdzob shes pa'i dmigs pa ni ci rigs par 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos thams cad yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:43a-31: chos shes bya ba'i spyod yul ni //
T07TD4090.2E:43a-32: 'dod pa'i sdug bsngal la sogs pa //
T07TD4090.2E:43a-33: chos shes pa'i dmigs pa ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal dang /
T07TD4090.2E:43a-35: 'gog pa dang lam rnams yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:43a-36: rjes su shes pa'i spyod yul ni //
T07TD4090.2E:43a-37: gong ma'i sdug bsngal la sogs yin //
T07TD4090.2E:43a-38: rjes su shes pa'i dmigs pa ni gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal dang /
T07TD4090.2E:43b-0: de dag nyid bden @43b bye brag gis //
T07TD4090.2E:43b-2: chos shes pa dang rjes su shes pa de dag nyid bden pa'i bye brag gis sdug bsngal dang /
T07TD4090.2E:43b-5: lam shes pa rnams dang shes pa bzhi yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:43b-6: de dag la dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:43b-8: mi skye ba dang zad pa shes //
T07TD4090.2E:43b-9: chos dang rjes su shes pa lta ba'i rang bzhin ma yin pa rnam pa bzhi po de dag kho nar zad pa shes pa dang mi skye ba shes pa zhes bya'o //
T07TD4090.2E:43b-10: de gnyis dang po skyes pa ni //
T07TD4090.2E:43b-11: sdug bsngal rgyu rjes shes pa yin //
T07TD4090.2E:43b-12: zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pa dang po skyes pa ni sdug bsngal dang /
T07TD4090.2E:43b-13: kun 'byung la rjes su shes pa yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:43b-14: srid pa'i rtse mo'i phung po la sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung la rjes su shes pa'i rnam par dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:43b-15: yang ci rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin kyang de gnyis dang dmigs pa gcig pa zhig yin nam zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:43b-16: gal te sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung la dmigs na ni yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:43b-17: 'on te 'gog pa dang lam la dmigs pa zhig yin na ni dmigs pa gcig pa ma yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:43b-18: bzhi las pha rol sems rig pa //
T07TD4090.2E:43b-19: rig par byed pas na rig pa ste shes pa'o //
T07TD4090.2E:43b-20: pha rol gyi sems shes pa ni shes pa bzhi las skye bar blta bar bya ste /
T07TD4090.2E:43b-21: chos shes pa dang rjes su shes pa dang lam shes pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:43b-22: kun rdzob shes pa rnams las so //
T07TD4090.2E:43b-23: de'i nges pa ni 'di yin te //
T07TD4090.2E:43b-24: des ni sa dbang gang zag 'das //
T07TD4090.2E:43b-25: zhig dang ma skyes mi rig go //
T07TD4090.2E:43b-26: sa 'das pa mi shes pa ni bsam gtan 'og ma'i sa pas bsam gtan gong ma'i sa pa mi shes pa'o //
T07TD4090.2E:43b-27: dbang po 'das pa mi shes pa ni dad pas mos pa dang dus kyis rnam par grol ba'i lam gyis mthong bas thob pa dang dus dang mi sbyor bar rnam par grol ba'i lam mi shes pa'o //
T07TD4090.2E:43b-28: gang zag 'das pa mi shes pa ni phyir mi 'ong ba dang dgra bcom pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:43b-29: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang sangs rgyas kyi lam rnams 'og mas gong ma mi shes pa'o //
T07TD4090.2E:43b-30: zhig pa dang ma skyes pa mi shes pa ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa mi shes pa ste /
T07TD4090.2E:43b-31: da ltar gyi pha rol gyi sems yul yin pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:43b-32: gzhan yang chos rjes blo phyogs phan tshun min //
T07TD4090.2E:44a-0: @44a * // pha rol gyi sems shes pa chos shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pas kyang rjes su shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa'i sems mi shes la /
T07TD4090.2E:44a-1: rjes su shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pas kyang chos shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa'i sems mi shes te /
T07TD4090.2E:44a-2: de gnyis ni 'dod pa'i khams dang khams gong ma'i gnyen po la dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:44a-3: mthong ba'i lam la pha rol gyi sems shes pa med do //
T07TD4090.2E:44a-4: de'i dmigs pa ni yod de /
T07TD4090.2E:44a-5: de la pha rol gyi sems shes pas mthong ba'i lam shes par 'dod pas sbyor ba byas na /
T07TD4090.2E:44a-6: nyan thos mthong ba'i skad cig gnyis //
T07TD4090.2E:44a-7: rig ste bse ru lta bus gsum //
T07TD4090.2E:44a-8: sangs rgyas sbyor ba med par kun //
T07TD4090.2E:44a-9: nyan thos kyis ni pha rol gyi sems shes pas mthong ba'i lam las skad cig ma gnyis shes te /
T07TD4090.2E:44a-10: sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:44a-12: rjes su shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa la dmigs pa ni sbyor ba gzhan gyis bsgrub par bya ba yin pa'i phyir de ji srid kyis sbyor ba rtsom pa de srid gyis [*kyis] des sems bcu drug rjes su 'thob par 'gyur bas bar du ni mi shes so //
T07TD4090.2E:44a-13: rang sangs rgyas kyis ni dang po gnyis dang brgyad pa kun 'byung la rjes su shes pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:44a-15: sbyor ba chung ba'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:44a-16: gzhan dag na re dang po dang gnyis pa dang bco lnga pa rnams shes so zhes zer ro //
T07TD4090.2E:44a-17: sangs rgyas kyis ni sbyor ba med par mthong ba'i lam gyi skad cig ma thams cad mkhyen to //
T07TD4090.2E:44a-18: yang zad pa shes pa dang mi skye ba shes pa dag la khyad par ci yod ce na /
T07TD4090.2E:44a-19: zad pa shes pa bden rnams la //
T07TD4090.2E:44a-20: yongs shes la sogs nges pa'o //
T07TD4090.2E:44a-21: yongs shes byar med ces la sogs //
T07TD4090.2E:44a-22: mi skye ba yi blor 'dod do //
T07TD4090.2E:44a-24: zad pa shes pa gang zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:44a-25: bdag gis sdug bsngal yongs su shes so zhes bya bar shes pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:44a-28: lam bsgoms so zhes bya bar shes pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i shes pa dang mthong ba dang rig ba dang blo dang rtogs pa dang shes rab dang snang ba dang mngon par rtogs pa gang yin pa 'di ni zad pa shes pa zhes bya'o //
T07TD4090.2E:44a-29: mi skye ba shes pa gang zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:44b-0: bdag gis @44b sdug bsngal yongs su shes te /
T07TD4090.2E:44b-1: yang yongs su shes par byar med do zhes bya bar shes pa nas bdag gis lam bsgoms te yang bsgom du med do zhes bya ba'i bar du shes pa de'i rgyu las byung ba'i zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ngo //
T07TD4090.2E:44b-2: ji ltar na zag pa med pa'i shes pas de ltar shes she na /
T07TD4090.2E:44b-3: kha che ba rnams na re bstan bcos las /
T07TD4090.2E:44b-4: de'i rjes la langs bas de ltar shes te /
T07TD4090.2E:44b-5: de'i phyir de'i bye brag gis de gnyis kyi bye brag bstan to zhes zer ro //
T07TD4090.2E:44b-6: gzhan dag na re zag pa med pas kyang de ltar shes te /
T07TD4090.2E:44b-7: mthong ba smos pa ni bshad pa 'phangs pa'i phyir ram /
T07TD4090.2E:44b-8: yang na mngon sum du 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:44b-9: de nyid kyi phyir re zhig shes pa gang yin pa de ni mthong ba yang yin no zhes 'byung ngo zhes zer ro //
T07TD4090.2E:44b-10: de ltar na de dag ni shes pa bcu yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:44b-11: 'di lta ste chos shes pa dang rjes su shes pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:44b-13: pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:44b-20: de la kun rdzob shes pa ni shes pa gcig yin la gcig gi cha yang yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:44b-21: chos shes pa ni shes pa gcig yin la bdun gyi cha yang yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:44b-22: rjes su shes pa yang de dang 'dra'o //
T07TD4090.2E:44b-23: sdug bsngal shes pa ni shes pa gcig yin la bzhi'i cha yang yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:44b-24: kun 'byung ba dang 'gog pa shes pa de dang 'dra'o //
T07TD4090.2E:44b-25: lam shes pa ni shes pa gcig yin la lnga'i cha yang yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:44b-26: pha rol gyi sems shes pa ni shes pa gcig yin la bzhi'i cha yang yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:44b-27: zad pa ni shes pa gcig yin la /
T07TD4090.2E:44b-28: drug gi cha yang yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:44b-29: mi skye ba shes pa yang de dang 'dra'o //
T07TD4090.2E:44b-30: ci'i phyir de dag gsum yod la bcur rnam par gzhag ce na /
T07TD4090.2E:44b-31: rang bzhin dang ni gnyen po dang //
T07TD4090.2E:44b-32: rnam pa rnam pa spyod yul dang //
T07TD4090.2E:44b-33: sbyor dang bya ba byas nyid dang //
T07TD4090.2E:44b-34: rgyu rgyas pa las bcu yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:44b-35: rgyu bdun gyis shes pa bcur rnam par gzhag go zhes grag ste /
T07TD4090.2E:44b-36: rang bzhin las ni kun rdzob shes pa ste /
T07TD4090.2E:44b-37: don dam pa mi shes pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:44b-38: gnyen po las ni chos dang rjes su shes pa dag ste /
T07TD4090.2E:45a-0: 'dod pa'i khams dang khams gong ma'i @45a * //
T07TD4090.2E:45a-1: gnyen po yin pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:45a-2: rnam pa las ni sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba shes pa dag ste /
T07TD4090.2E:45a-3: dmigs pa tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:45a-4: rnam pa dang dmigs pa las ni 'gog pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:45a-6: rnam pa dang dmigs pa tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:45a-7: sbyor ba las ni pha rol gyi sems shes pa ste /
T07TD4090.2E:45a-8: des ni sems las byung ba rnams kyang mi shes pa ma yin mod kyi sems shes par bya ba'i phyir sbyor ba byas pa las grub pa'i phyir pha rol gyi sems shes pa zhes bshad do //
T07TD4090.2E:45a-9: bya ba byas pa las ni zad pa shes pa ste /
T07TD4090.2E:45a-10: bya ba byas pa'i rgyud la dang po nyid du skye ba'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:45a-11: rgyu rgyas pa las ni mi skye ba shes pa ste /
T07TD4090.2E:45a-12: zag pa med pa'i shes pa thams cad kyi rgyu can yin pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:45a-13: thams cad kyi gnyen po thams cad yin pa'i phyir /
T07TD4090.2E:45a-14: chos shes pa 'dod pa'i khams kyi gnyen po zhes bshad par zad kyi gzhan yang /
T07TD4090.2E:45a-16: lam la chos shes gang yin pa //
T07TD4090.2E:45a-17: khams gsum gyi ni gnyen po yin //
T07TD4090.2E:45a-18: 'gog pa dang lam la chos shes pa bsgom pa'i lam gyis bsdus pa dag ni khams gsum char gyi gnyen po yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:45a-19: 'dod pa'i khams kyi rjes ma yin //
T07TD4090.2E:45a-20: 'dod pa'i khams kyi gnyen po rjes su shes pa ni rnam pa thams cad du med do //
T07TD4090.2E:45a-21: shes pa bcu po de dag las //
T07TD4090.2E:45a-22: chos shes pa dang rjes su shes //
T07TD4090.2E:45a-23: rnam pa bcu drug / de dag ni 'og nas bshad par bya'o //
T07TD4090.2E:45a-26: kun rdzob shes pa ni rnam pa bcu drug can yang yin la gzhan gyi rnam pa can yang yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:45a-27: chos thams cad kyi rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid la sogs pa 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:45a-28: rang rang gi bden pa'i rnam pas bzhi yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:45a-30: 'gog pa dang lam shes pa rnams ni rang rang gi bden pa'i rnam pa dag tu 'jug pas re re zhing rnam pa bzhi bzhi yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:45a-31: pha rol yid shes dri med kyang /
T07TD4090.2E:45a-32: de bzhin pha rol gyi sems shes pa zag pa med pa yang de bzhin kho nar rang gi bden pa'i rnam pa can yin pa'i phyir rnam pa bzhi can yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:45a-33: lam shes pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:45a-35: shes bya'i rang gi mtshan nyid rnams /
T07TD4090.2E:45b-0: @45b pha rol gyi sems shes pa zag pa dang bcas pa ni shes bya sems dang sems las byung ba rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid gang yin pa de'i rnam pa 'dzin te /
T07TD4090.2E:45b-1: rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:45b-3: rdzas re re zhig spyod yul lo //
T07TD4090.2E:45b-4: gang gi tshe sems 'dzin pa de'i tshe sems las byung ba rnams mi 'dzin la /
T07TD4090.2E:45b-5: gang gi tshe tshor ba 'dzin pa de'i tshe 'du shes mi 'dzin zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa'o //
T07TD4090.2E:45b-6: 'o na bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems la yang 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa gang gsungs pa ji lta bu zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:45b-7: de gnyis cig car du 'dzin pa ni ma yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:45b-8: gos dang dri ma cig car du mi 'dzin pa bzhin no //
T07TD4090.2E:45b-9: 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags dang bcas pa nyid rnam pa gnyis te /
T07TD4090.2E:45b-10: 'dres pa'i 'dod chags dang bcas pa nyid dang /
T07TD4090.2E:45b-11: ldan pa'i 'dod chags dang bcas pa nyid do //
T07TD4090.2E:45b-12: de la 'dod chags dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems ni gnyis kyis 'dod chags dang bcas pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:45b-13: de las gzhan pa zag pa dang bcas pa ni ldan pa'i 'dod chags dang bcas pas na 'dod chags dang bcas pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:45b-14: kha cig na re mdo 'dir ni 'dod chags dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems ni 'dod chags dang bcas pa yin la /
T07TD4090.2E:45b-15: 'dod chags kyi gnyen por ni 'dod chags dang bral bar bshad pa yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:45b-16: gal te 'dod chags dang mtshungs par mi ldan pa 'dod chags dang bral ba yin na ni nyon mongs pa gzhan dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang yin par 'gyur ro zhes zer ro //
T07TD4090.2E:45b-17: gzhan dag na re de lta na ni 'o na de'i gnyen po ma yin pa'i sems nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa 'dod chags dang bcas pa yang ma yin la /
T07TD4090.2E:45b-18: 'dod chags dang bral ba yang ma yin zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs par 'gyur bas /
T07TD4090.2E:45b-19: de lta bas na mdo 'dir 'dod chags dang ldan pas kyang 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems su 'dod par bya ste /
T07TD4090.2E:46a-0: gti mug dang bcas pa dang gti mug dang bral ba'i bar du yang de dang 'dra bar shes @46a * //
T07TD4090.2E:46a-2: bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re kun du bsdus pa ni dmigs pa la mngon par sdud pa'i phyir dge ba yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:46a-3: rnam par g-yeng ba ni rnam par g-yeng ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa can yin no zhes zer ro //
T07TD4090.2E:46a-4: nub phyogs pa rnams na re kun tu bsdus pa ni gnyid dang mtshungs par ldan pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:46a-5: rnam par g-yeng ba ni nyon mongs pa can gzhan yin no zhes zer ro //
T07TD4090.2E:46a-6: de skad du mi brjod de /
T07TD4090.2E:46a-7: nyon mongs pa can gyi gnyid dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir sems de nyid bsdus pa yang yin la rnam par g-yengs pa yang yin par 'gyur ro //
T07TD4090.2E:46a-9: sems kun du bsdus pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
T07TD4090.2E:46a-10: de shes pa'i shes pa ni bzhi ste /
T07TD4090.2E:46a-14: lam shes pa'o zhes 'byung ba dang yang 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
T07TD4090.2E:46a-15: sems zhum pa ni le lo dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:46a-16: rab tu bzung ba ni brtson 'grus dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir dge ba yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:46a-17: chung ngu ni rnam par byang ba chung du dag gis bsten pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa can yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:46a-18: chen por gyur pa ni de las bzlog pa yin pa'i phyir dge ba yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:46a-23: stobs che chung gi yang phyir te /
T07TD4090.2E:46a-24: nyon mongs pa can ni mi dge ba'i rtsa ba gnyis kyis rtsa ba dang bcas pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:46a-25: dge ba ni dge ba'i rtsa ba gsum gyis so //
T07TD4090.2E:46a-26: nyon mongs pa can ni 'bad pas bsgrub par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir rin chung ba yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:46a-27: dge ba ni tshogs chen pos bsgrub par bya ba yin pa'i phyir rin che ba yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:46a-28: nyon mongs pa can ni de dang 'dra ba ma 'ongs pa 'thob pa'i phyir 'khor mang ba ma yin la phung po gsum gyis rjes su 'brang ba dang bcas pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:46a-29: dge ba ni 'khor mang ba yin la phung po bzhis rjes su 'brang ba dang bcas pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:46a-30: yang nyon mongs pa can ni stobs chung ba yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:46a-31: dge ba ni stobs che ba yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:46b-0: sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa gcig gis kyang phra rgyas bcu gtan du 'joms par byed pas @46b de'i phyir yang nyon mongs pa ni chung ba yin la dge ba ni chen por gyur pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:46b-1: rgod pa ni rgod pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa can yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:46b-2: rgod pa ma yin pa ni de'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir dge ba yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:46b-3: rnam par ma zhi ba dang /
T07TD4090.2E:46b-4: rnam par zhi ba yang de dang 'dra'o //
T07TD4090.2E:46b-5: mnyam par ma bzhag pa ni rnam par g-yeng ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa can no //
T07TD4090.2E:46b-6: mnyam par bzhag pa ni de'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir dge ba yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:46b-7: ma bsgoms pa ni 'thob pa dang bsten pa'i bsgom pa dag gis ma bsgoms pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa can no ;
T07TD4090.2E:46b-8: / bsgoms pa ni de gnyis kyis bsgoms pa'i phyir dge ba yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:46b-9: rnam par ma grol ba ni rang bzhin dang rgyud rnam par ma grol ba dag gis rnam par grol ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa can yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:46b-10: rnam par grol ba ni de gnyis kyis rnam par grol ba'i phyir dge ba yin no zhes zer ro //
T07TD4090.2E:46b-11: de lta na ni mdo dang mi mthun par byas pa yang yin la /
T07TD4090.2E:46b-12: tshig de rnams kyi don gyi khyad par yang ma bshad pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:46b-13: ji ltar na mdo dang mi mthun par byas pa yin zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:46b-14: mdo las ji ltar na sems nang du kun du bsdus pa yin zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:46b-15: sems gang rmugs pa dang gnyid dang lhan cig par gyur cing nang du kun du 'gog pa dang lhan cig par gyur la lhag mthong dang mtshungs par mi ldan pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:46b-16: ji ltar na phyi rol du rnam par g-yengs pa yin zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:46b-17: sems gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams la rjes su g-yengs pa yin zhing rnam par 'phros pa yin no zhes gsungs so //
T07TD4090.2E:46b-18: sems de nyid kun du bsdus pa yin la rnam par g-yengs pa yang yin par 'gyur ro zhes kyang bshad pa yin nam zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:46b-19: de skad du ni bshad mod kyi rigs par bshad pa ni ma yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:46b-20: nyon mongs pa can gyi gnyid dang lhan cig par gyur ba rnam par g-yengs pa nyid du dam ma bcas pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:46b-21: bstan bcos dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro zhes kyang bshad pa ma yin nam /
T07TD4090.2E:46b-22: bstan bcos dang 'gal ba ni bla'i mdo dang 'gal ba ni ma yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:46b-23: ji ltar na tshig de rnams kyi don gyi khyad par ma bshad pa yin zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:47a-3: rgod pa dang rnam par ma zhi ba dang /
T07TD4090.2E:47a-4: mnyam par ma bzhag pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:47a-6: rnam par ma grol ba rnams kyi mtshan nyid kyang tha mi dad par bshad pa'i phyir la /
T07TD4090.2E:47a-8: rab tu bzung ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyang tha mi dad par bshad pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:47a-9: tshig rnams kyi don gyi khyad par ni ma bshad pa ma yin pa nyid de /
T07TD4090.2E:47a-10: nyon mongs pa can du mtshungs kyang 'di ltar sems nyon mongs pa can 'di ni rnam par g-yengs pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:47a-11: 'di ni zhum pa yin no zhes bya ba rgyas par de'i nyes pa'i khyad par yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir la /
T07TD4090.2E:47a-12: de bzhin du dge ba yang yon tan gyi khyad par yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir don gyi khyad par bshad pa kho na yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:47a-13: mdo dang 'gal ba ma spangs pa'i phyir de ni tshig de rnams kyi don ma yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:47a-14: gal te mdo las sems de nyid zhum pa yang yin la de nyid rgod pa yang yin no zhes bya bar bshad na ni gang gi tshe sems zhum pa dang zhum par dogs pa de'i tshe shin tu sbyangs pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:47a-16: btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsgom pa'i dus ma yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:47a-17: gang gi tshe sems rgod pa dang rgod par dogs pa de'i tshe chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:47a-19: dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsgom pa'i dus ma yin no zhes pa 'di dag gsungs par mi 'gyur ro //
T07TD4090.2E:47a-20: ci 'di la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so sor bsgom mam zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:47a-21: 'di dag yid la byed pa bsgom pa yin par 'dod kyi mngon sum du gyur pa ni ma yin pas nyes pa med pa nyid do //
T07TD4090.2E:47a-22: 'di las le lo lhag pa'i sems ni zhum pa zhes bshad la /
T07TD4090.2E:47a-23: rgod pa lhag pa ni rgod pa zhes bshad pas 'gal ba med de /
T07TD4090.2E:47a-24: de gnyis kyang lhan cig pa yin pa'i phyir sems de nyid zhum pa yang yin la de nyid rgod pa yang yin zhes smra'o //
T07TD4090.2E:47a-25: bsam pa can gyi tshig la ni bzlog pa med kyi mdo'i dgongs pa ni 'di ma yin no zhes smra'o //
T07TD4090.2E:47a-26: 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems thams cad 'dod chags dang bcas pa yin no zhes gang bshad pa /
T07TD4090.2E:47b-0: 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems @47b gang zhig yin /
T07TD4090.2E:47b-1: gal te 'dod chags kyi thob pa dang lhan cig pa yin no zhe na ni slob pa'i sems zag pa med pa yang 'dod chags dang bcas par 'gyur ro //
T07TD4090.2E:47b-2: gal te 'dod chags kyi dmigs pa yin no zhe na ni dgra bcom pa'i sems zag pa dang bcas pa yang 'dod chags dang bcas pa zhes bya bar gzung bar 'gyur te /
T07TD4090.2E:47b-3: 'dod chags kyi dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:47b-4: yang na ji ltar de zag pa dang bcas pa yin /
T07TD4090.2E:47b-5: gal te nyon mongs pa spyi ba'i dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na ni /
T07TD4090.2E:47b-6: de lta na yang gti mug dang bcas par gzung bar 'gyur te /
T07TD4090.2E:47b-7: gti mug gi dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:47b-8: gzhan gyi sems shes pa ni thob pa la dmigs pa yang ma yin la /
T07TD4090.2E:47b-9: sems de la dmigs pa'i 'dod chags la dmigs pa can yang ma yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:47b-10: de lta bas na 'dir 'dod chags dang ldan pas 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems su 'dod par mi bya'o ;
T07TD4090.2E:47b-11: 'o na ji lta bu zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:47b-12: mdo'i dgongs pa ni 'dod chags dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems ni 'dod chags dang bcas pa yin la /
T07TD4090.2E:47b-13: 'dod chags dang mtshungs par mi ldan pa'i sems ni 'dod chags dang bral ba yin no zhes bya bar snang ngo //
T07TD4090.2E:47b-14: gang las 'di'i sems 'dod chags dang bral ba yin /
T07TD4090.2E:47b-15: zhe sdang dang bral ba dang /
T07TD4090.2E:47b-16: gti mug dang bral ba yin /
T07TD4090.2E:47b-19: gzugs med pa'i srid par phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can yin zhes gsungs pa der ni de'i thob pa dang bral ba las dgongs te gsungs pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:47b-20: nyon mongs pa gzhan dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems kyang 'dod chags dang mtshungs par mi ldan pa'i phyir 'dod chags dang bral ba yin par 'gyur ro zhes bshad pa ma yin nam dgongs pa 'di ni nyes pa med de /
T07TD4090.2E:47b-21: de ni 'dod chags dang bral ba zhes bya bar mi gzung ngo //
T07TD4090.2E:47b-23: zhe sdang dang bcas pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:47b-24: gti mug dang bcas pa zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs par gzung ngo //
T07TD4090.2E:47b-26: grub pa'i mtha' brjod par bya ste /
T07TD4090.2E:47b-27: ci pha rol gyi sems shes pa pha rol gyi sems kyi rnam pa 'am dmigs pa 'dzin zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:48a-1: ni rnam pa dang dmigs pa la mi ltos pa yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:48a-2: sems 'di chags pa yin no zhes bya bar shes kyi gzugs che ge mo zhig la chags so zhes bya bar ni mi shes so //
T07TD4090.2E:48a-4: de gzugs la dmigs par yang 'gyur la /
T07TD4090.2E:48a-5: de la dmigs pa'i pha rol gyi sems 'dzin pa ni rang gi ngo bo nyid 'dzin par yang 'gyur ro //
T07TD4090.2E:48a-6: gzhan gyi sems shes pa thams cad ni sems dang sems las byung ba dang /
T07TD4090.2E:48a-7: rdzas kyi rang gi mtshan nyid dang /
T07TD4090.2E:48a-9: pha rol gyi rgyud dang 'dod pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:48a-11: ldan pa ma yin pa'i yul can mthong ba'i lam bkag pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:48a-12: bsgom pa'i lam la dmigs pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:48a-13: stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang mi ldan pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:48a-14: zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pas ma bsdus pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:48a-15: bar chad med pa'i lam bkag pa yin par rig par bya'o //
T07TD4090.2E:48a-16: pha rol gyi sems shes pa bshad zin to //
T07TD4090.2E:48a-17: lhag ma rnam pa bcu bzhi can //
T07TD4090.2E:48a-18: stong dang bdag med ma gtogs so //
T07TD4090.2E:48a-19: lhag ma ni zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pa dag ste /
T07TD4090.2E:48a-20: de gnyis ni stong pa dang bdag med pa'i rnam pa dag ma gtogs pa rnam pa bcu bzhi can yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:48a-21: don dam pa pa dag yin yang de dag gi stobs kyi rjes su tha snyad 'dogs pa'i sgo nas bdag gi skye ba zad do //
T07TD4090.2E:48a-22: 'di las srid pa gzhan rab tu mi shes so zhes kun rdzob la ston pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:48a-23: ci zag pa med pa la rang gi mtshan nyid kyi rnam pa yod dam /
T07TD4090.2E:48a-25: re zhig kha che ba rnams kyi ltar na /
T07TD4090.2E:48a-26: dri med bcu drug gzhan rnams med //
T07TD4090.2E:48a-27: rnam pa bcu drug las ma gtogs pa zag pa med pa'i rnam pa med do //
T07TD4090.2E:48a-28: gzhan yod ces bya bstan bcos las //
T07TD4090.2E:48a-29: gzhan nyi 'og pa rnams na re yod do zhes zer ro //
T07TD4090.2E:48a-30: ji ltar na khong du chud ce na /
T07TD4090.2E:48a-31: bstan bcos las zhes bya ba smos te /
T07TD4090.2E:48a-32: bstan bcos las 'di skad du mi ldan pa'i sems kyis 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i chos rnams shes par 'gyur ba yod dam zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:48a-34: rigs pas bskyed pa'i sgo nas mi rtag pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:48b-3: 'di ni gzhi yod do zhes bya bar shes par 'gyur ro zhes 'byung ngo //
T07TD4090.2E:48b-4: gal te gang las 'di ni gnas yod do //
T07TD4090.2E:48b-5: 'di ni gzhi yod do zhes de snyam du shes par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di'i don ni 'di ma yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:48b-6: 'on kyang mi rtag pa la sogs pa shes par 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni gnas yod do //
T07TD4090.2E:48b-7: 'di ni gzhi yod do zhes bya ba yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:48b-10: gzhan nas mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:48b-11: gal te 'di bstan bcos kyi don yin par 'gyur na /
T07TD4090.2E:48b-12: 'di skad du mthong bas spang par bya ba'i sems kyis 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i chos rnams shes par 'gyur ba yod dam zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:48b-14: rigs pa ma yin pas bskyed pa'i sgo nas bdag dang /
T07TD4090.2E:48b-27: nges par 'dzin par byed pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:48b-30: the tshom du shes par 'gyur zhing /
T07TD4090.2E:48b-34: rmongs par 'gyur ro zhes gang gsungs pa der yang 'di skad du 'di ni gnas yod do //
T07TD4090.2E:48b-35: 'di ni gzhi yod do zhes 'byung bar 'gyur ba zhig na /
T07TD4090.2E:48b-37: de lta bas na 'di ni de'i don ma yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:48b-38: ci rnam pa bcu drug po 'di dag ming gi sgo nas sam /
T07TD4090.2E:48b-40: kha cig na re rdzas su ni bdun yin la ming gi sgo nas ni bcu drug yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:48b-43: lam rnams rdzas su re re yin pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro //
T07TD4090.2E:48b-44: 'di skad du brjod de rdzas su rnam pa bcu drug go //
T07TD4090.2E:48b-45: de la rkyen la rag lus pa'i phyir mi rtag pa'o //
T07TD4090.2E:48b-46: gnod pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir sdug bsngal ba'o //
T07TD4090.2E:48b-47: bdag gir lta ba'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyis stong pa'o //
T07TD4090.2E:48b-48: bdag tu lta ba'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyis bdag med pa'o //
T07TD4090.2E:48b-49: sa bon gyi chos kyi tshul gyis rgyu'o //
T07TD4090.2E:48b-50: 'byung ba'i chos kyi tshul gyis kun 'byung ba'o //
T07TD4090.2E:48b-51: 'brel ba'i tshul gyis rab tu skye ba'o //
T07TD4090.2E:49a-0: @49a * // mngon par sgrub pa'i don gyis ni rkyen te /
T07TD4090.2E:49a-1: dper na 'jim pa'i gong bu dang thal zhar dang 'khor lo dang thag gu dang chu rnams 'dus pa las bum pa mngon par grub pa de bzhin no //
T07TD4090.2E:49a-2: phung po zhig pa'i phyir 'gog pa'o //
T07TD4090.2E:49a-3: me gsum zhi ba'i phyir zhi ba'o //
T07TD4090.2E:49a-4: 'tshe ba med pa'i phyir gya nom pa'o //
T07TD4090.2E:49a-5: skyon thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir nges par 'byung ba'o //
T07TD4090.2E:49a-6: bgrod pa'i don gyis lam mo //
T07TD4090.2E:49a-7: rigs pa dang ldan pa'i phyir rigs pa'o //
T07TD4090.2E:49a-8: yang dag par bsgrub pa'i don gyis sgrub pa'o //
T07TD4090.2E:49a-9: shin tu yang dag par 'da' bar byed pa'i phyir nges par 'byin par byed pa'o //
T07TD4090.2E:49a-10: yang na gtan du ba ma yin pa'i phyir mi rtag pa'o //
T07TD4090.2E:49a-11: khur lta bur gyur pa'i phyir /
T07TD4090.2E:49a-13: nang gi skyes bu dang bral ba'i phyir stong pa'o //
T07TD4090.2E:49a-14: 'dod dgur byed pa med pa'i phyir bdag med pa'o //
T07TD4090.2E:49a-17: 'phel ba'i tshul gyis rab tu skye ba'o //
T07TD4090.2E:49a-18: so sor 'brad ba'i tshul gyis rkyen no //
T07TD4090.2E:49a-19: 'brel ba med pas 'brel pa zhig pa'i phyir 'gog pa'o //
T07TD4090.2E:49a-20: 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid gsum dang 'bral ba'i phyir zhi ba'o //
T07TD4090.2E:49a-21: dge ba'i phyir gya nom pa'o //
T07TD4090.2E:49a-22: yid brtan pa'i mchog yin pa'i phyir nges par 'byung ba'o //
T07TD4090.2E:49a-23: lam ngan pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyis lam mo //
T07TD4090.2E:49a-24: rigs pa ma yin pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyis rigs pa'o //
T07TD4090.2E:49a-25: mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong dang /
T07TD4090.2E:49a-26: mi 'gal ba'i don gyis sgrub pa'o //
T07TD4090.2E:49a-27: srid pa thams cad kyi gnyen po yin pa'i phyir nges par 'byin par byed pa'o //
T07TD4090.2E:49a-28: ji ltar 'dod pa brjod par bya ste skye ba dang 'jig pa'i chos can yin pa'i phyir mi rtag pa'o //
T07TD4090.2E:49a-29: mi mthun par gyur pa'i phyir sdug bsngal ba'o //
T07TD4090.2E:49a-30: bdag dang bral ba'i phyir stong pa'o //
T07TD4090.2E:49a-31: bdag nyid kyis bdag ma yin pa'i phyir bdag med pa'o //
T07TD4090.2E:49a-35: rkyen nyid ni gang mdo las nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag ni 'dun pa'i rtsa ba can /
T07TD4090.2E:49a-38: 'dun pa las rab tu skye ba dag yin no zhes gsungs pa kho na yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:49b-0: rab tu skye ba zhes bya ba'i sgra tha mar gdon ba 'ba' zhig tu @49b zad do //
T07TD4090.2E:49b-1: yang 'di dag la khyad par ci yod ce na /
T07TD4090.2E:49b-2: 'dun pa ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
T07TD4090.2E:49b-3: nga'o snyam pa ni bye brag med par lus pa 'dun pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:49b-4: gyur cig snyam pa ni bye brag tu med par yang srid pa la 'dun pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:49b-5: 'di lta bur gyur cig snyam pa ni /
T07TD4090.2E:49b-6: bye brag tu yang srid pa la 'dun pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:49b-7: bzhi pa ni nying mtshams sbyor ba'i 'ching ba la 'dun pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:49b-8: yang na las mngon par 'du byed pa la 'dun pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:49b-9: de la dang po ni sdug bsngal gyi dang po'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir rtsa ba'i rgyu yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:49b-11: gnyis pa ni kun 'byung ba yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:49b-12: des de yang dag par 'grub pa'i phyir /
T07TD4090.2E:49b-13: 'bras bu'i myu gu la sogs pa skye ba bzhin no //
T07TD4090.2E:49b-14: gsum pa ni de dang 'dra ba'i sdug bsngal gyi rkyen yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:49b-15: 'bras bu'i zhing dang chu dang lud la sogs pa bzhin no //
T07TD4090.2E:49b-16: zhing la sogs pa'i dbang gis ni 'bras bu'i dri dang ro dang /
T07TD4090.2E:49b-18: smin pa dang mthu dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
T07TD4090.2E:49b-19: bzhi pa ni rab tu skye ba ste /
T07TD4090.2E:49b-20: de kho na las de skye ba'i phyir 'bras bu'i tha ma me tog bzhin no //
T07TD4090.2E:49b-21: yang na sred pa rnam par spyad pa rnams kyi 'dun pa bzhi ni sred pa'i bye brag rnams las lnga tshan gnyis dang /
T07TD4090.2E:49b-23: dge slong dag nga'o snyam pa yod na nga 'di lta bu'o snyam pa 'byung bar 'gyur zhing /
T07TD4090.2E:49b-25: nga de lta ma yin no snyam pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:49b-26: nga bzang ngo snyam pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:49b-27: nga ngan no snyam pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T07TD4090.2E:49b-28: de la 'byung bar 'gyur bar bya'o snyam par 'gyur zhing /
T07TD4090.2E:49b-29: de la 'byung bar 'gyur bar mi bya'o snyam pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:49b-30: 'di lta bur 'byung bar 'gyur bar bya'o snyam pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:49b-31: 'di 'dra bar 'byung bar 'gyur bar bya'o snyam pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:49b-32: de lta ma yin par 'byung bar 'gyur bar bya'o snyam pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T07TD4090.2E:49b-33: de la gyur cig snyam pa 'byung bar 'gyur zhing /
T07TD4090.2E:49b-34: de la 'di lta bur gyur cig snyam pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:49b-35: de 'dra bar gyur cig snyam pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:49b-36: de lta ma yin par gyur cig snyam pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:49b-37: gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:49b-38: 'di lta bur gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:49b-39: 'di 'dra bar gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:50a-0: de lta ma yin par gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa 'byung bar 'gyur @50a * //
T07TD4090.2E:50a-1: ro zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:50a-3: sdug bsngal med pa'i phyir zhi ba ste /
T07TD4090.2E:50a-4: dge slong dag de ltar na 'du byed rnams ni sdug bsngal ba'o //
T07TD4090.2E:50a-5: mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:50a-6: gong na med pa'i phyir gya nom pa'o //
T07TD4090.2E:50a-7: yang phyir mi ldog pa'i phyir nges par 'byung ba'o //
T07TD4090.2E:50a-8: lam lta bur gyur pa'i phyir lam mo //
T07TD4090.2E:50a-9: yang dag pa ji lta bzhin du zhugs pa'i phyir rigs pa'o //
T07TD4090.2E:50a-10: so sor nges pa'i phyir sgrub ba ste /
T07TD4090.2E:50a-11: ji skad du mthong ba rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir 'di lam yin gyi gzhan ni med do zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o //
T07TD4090.2E:50a-12: gtan du nges par 'byung bar byed pa'i phyir nges par 'byin pa'o //
T07TD4090.2E:50a-16: bdag tu lta pa spyad pa rnams kyi gnyen por go rims bzhin du mi rtag pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:50a-19: bdag med pa'i rnam pa dag yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:50a-24: lta ba spyad pa rnams kyi gnyen por go rims bzhin du rgyu dang /
T07TD4090.2E:50a-27: rkyen gyi rnam pa dag yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:50a-28: thar pa med do snyam du lta ba spyad pa rnams kyi gnyen por 'gog pa'i rnam pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:50a-29: sdug bsngal la thar pa yin no snyam du lta ba spyad pa rnams kyi gnyen bor zhi ba'i rnam pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:50a-30: bsam gtan gyi bde ba gya nom pa yin par lta ba spyad pa rnams kyi gnyen por gya nom pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:50a-31: yang dang yang yongs su nyams bar 'gyur ba'i sgo nas thar ba ni gtan du ma yin no snyam du lta ba spyad pa rnams kyi gnyen por nges par 'byung ba'i rnam pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:50a-32: lam med do snyam pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:50a-33: lam 'di yin no snyam pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:50a-34: gzhan yang lam yin no snyam pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:50a-35: lam 'di yang lhag go snyam du lta bar spyad pa rnams kyi gnyen por go rims bzhin du lam dang /
T07TD4090.2E:50a-38: des par 'byin pa'i rnam pa dag yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:50a-39: rnam pa zhes bya ba'i chos 'di ci zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:50a-41: de lta na ni 'o na shes rab gzhan dang mtshungs par mi ldan pa'i phyir /
T07TD4090.2E:50b-0: shes rab rnam pa dang bcas @50b par mi 'gyur gyi /
T07TD4090.2E:50b-1: 'di ltar rnam pa ni sems dang sems las byung ba thams cad kyi dmigs pa 'dzin pa'i bye brag ni rnam pa yin no zhes bya ba ni rigs par 'gyur ro //
T07TD4090.2E:50b-2: yang ci shes rab kho nas 'dzin par byed dam zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:50b-5: de dang bcas pa'i dmigs pa dang bcas pas 'dzin par byed /
T07TD4090.2E:50b-7: dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i chos gzhan thams cad kyis kyang 'dzin par byed do //
T07TD4090.2E:50b-8: yod pa thams cad gzung bya yin //
T07TD4090.2E:50b-9: gang ci yod kyang rung thams cad gzung bar bya ba yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:50b-10: de ltar byas na shes rab ni rnam ba yang yin /
T07TD4090.2E:50b-12: gzung bar bya ba yang yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:50b-13: dmigs pa dang bcas pa gzhan ni 'dzin par byed pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:50b-14: gzung bar bya ba yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:50b-15: dmigs pa med pa rnams ni gzung bar bya ba kho na yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:50b-16: 'di man chad ni shes pa bcu po 'di dag gi dge ba la sogs pa'i bye brag bstan par bya ste /
T07TD4090.2E:50b-17: dang po rnam gsum gzhan rnams dge / kun rdzob shes pa ni tshigs su bcad pa'i dang po ni yod pa'i phyir dang po ste /
T07TD4090.2E:50b-18: de ni dge ba dang mi dge ba dang /
T07TD4090.2E:50b-19: lung du ma bstan pa dang rnam pa gsum yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:50b-20: shes pa gzhan dgu ni dge ba kho na yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:50b-21: dang pos rnams thams cad na /
T07TD4090.2E:50b-22: 'dod pa'i khams nas srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar na yod do //
T07TD4090.2E:50b-24: chos shes pa ni bsam gtan bzhi dang /
T07TD4090.2E:50b-25: mi lcogs pa med ba dang /
T07TD4090.2E:50b-26: bsam gtan khyad par can na yod do //
T07TD4090.2E:50b-27: dgu na rjes shes bya ba /
T07TD4090.2E:50b-28: rjes su shes pa ni sa drug po de dag nyid dang gzugs med pa gsum na yod do //
T07TD4090.2E:50b-29: de bzhin du drug / sdug bsngal dang /
T07TD4090.2E:50b-34: mi skye ba shes pa rnams kyang bye brag med bar ni sa dgu po de dag nyid na yod do //
T07TD4090.2E:50b-35: dbye ba ni chos shes pas bsdus pa rnams ni sa drug na yod do//
T07TD4090.2E:50b-36: rjes su shes pas bsdus pa rnams ni sa dgu na yod do //
T07TD4090.2E:50b-37: gzhan yid shes pa bsam gtan bzhi //
T07TD4090.2E:50b-38: pha rol gyi sems shes pa ni bsam gtan bzhi kho na na yod kyi gzhan na med do //
T07TD4090.2E:50b-39: de na 'dod dang gzugs rten can //
T07TD4090.2E:51a-0: pha rol gyi sems shes pa de ni 'dod pa dang gzugs kyi @51a * //
T07TD4090.2E:51a-1: khams dag tu mngon sum du byed do //
T07TD4090.2E:51a-2: chos shes bya ba 'dod rten can //
T07TD4090.2E:51a-3: chos shes pa ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi rten can kho na yin gyi /
T07TD4090.2E:51a-4: gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams dag tu ni mngon sum du mi byed do //
T07TD4090.2E:51a-5: khams gsum pa yi rten can gzhan //
T07TD4090.2E:51a-7: pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:51a-8: chos shes pa ma gtogs pa'o //
T07TD4090.2E:51a-9: sa dag dang rten bshad zin to //
T07TD4090.2E:51a-10: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis bsdus pa brjod par bya ste /
T07TD4090.2E:51a-12: 'gog blo dran pa nyer gzhag pa //
T07TD4090.2E:51a-13: gcig ste blo dang shes rab dang //
T07TD4090.2E:51a-14: shes pa zhes bya ba ni rnam grangs yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:51a-15: 'gog pa shes pa ni gcig ste /
T07TD4090.2E:51a-16: chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:51a-17: pha rol gyi sems blo ni gsum mo //
T07TD4090.2E:51a-18: pha rol gyi sems shes pa ni gsum ste /
T07TD4090.2E:51a-21: chos dran ba nye bar gzhag pa rnams yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:51a-24: pha rol gyi sems shes pa dag las gzhan pa'i shes pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi char yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:51a-25: shes pa gang gis dmigs pa shes pa du zhig yin zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:51a-26: chos blo'i spyod yul dgu yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:51a-27: chos shes pa'i dmigs pa ni shes pa dgu yin te ;
T07TD4090.2E:51a-28: rjes su shes pa ma gtogs so //
T07TD4090.2E:51a-29: lam rjes blo yi dgu yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:51a-30: rjes su shes pa'i dmigs pa yang shes pa dgu yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:51a-31: chos shes pa ma gtogs so //
T07TD4090.2E:51a-32: lam shes pa'i dmigs pa yang dgu yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:51a-33: kun rdzob shes pa ma gtogs so //
T07TD4090.2E:51a-34: sdug bsngal rgyu blo'i gnyis yin no ;
T07TD4090.2E:51a-35: sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung shes pa dag gi dmigs pa dag ni gnyis te /
T07TD4090.2E:51a-36: kun rdzob dang gzhan gyi sems shes pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:51a-39: gzhan gyi sems shes pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:51a-41: mi skye ba shes pa rnams kyi dmigs pa ni shes pa bcu char yang yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:51a-43: 'gog pa shes pa ni gcig phu'i dmigs pa ni shes pa ma yin pa nyid do //
T07TD4090.2E:51a-44: chos bcu dag ni sbyar bar bya /
T07TD4090.2E:51a-46: khams gsum pa dang dri med chos //
T07TD4090.2E:51a-47: 'dus ma byas rnams gnyis gnyis so //
T07TD4090.2E:51b-0: chos 'dus byas rnams la @51b 'dod pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:51b-1: gzugs dang gzugs med ba na spyod pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:51b-2: zag pa med pa rnams mtshungs par ldan pa dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i bye brag gis rnam pa brgyad du bya'o //
T07TD4090.2E:51b-3: 'dus ma byas rnams la dge ba dang /
T07TD4090.2E:51b-4: lung du ma bstan pa'i bye brag gis rnam ba gnyis su bya'o //
T07TD4090.2E:51b-5: chos bcu po 'di dag ji ltar sbyar bar bya zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:51b-6: shes pa gang gis dmigs pa du zhig yin zhes sbyar bar bya ste /
T07TD4090.2E:51b-7: de la kun rdzob shes pa'i dmigs pa ni chos bcu po thams cad yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:51b-8: chos shes pa ni lnga ste /
T07TD4090.2E:51b-12: 'dus ma byas dge ba yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:51b-13: rjes su shes pa ni bdun te /
T07TD4090.2E:51b-14: gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:51b-17: 'dus ma byas dge ba yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:51b-19: kun 'byung shes pa dag gi ni drug ste /
T07TD4090.2E:51b-22: gzugs med pa na spyod pa rnams yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:51b-23: 'gog pa shes pa'i ni gcig ste /
T07TD4090.2E:51b-24: 'dus ma byas dge ba kho na yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:51b-25: lam shes pa'i ni gnyis te /
T07TD4090.2E:51b-26: zag pa med pa dag yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:51b-27: gzhan gyi sems shes pa'i ni gsum ste /
T07TD4090.2E:51b-30: zag pa med pa dang mtshungs par ldan ba rnams yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:51b-31: zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pa dag gi dmigs pa ni chos dgu yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:51b-32: 'dus ma byas lung du ma bstan pa ma gtogs so //
T07TD4090.2E:51b-33: shes pa gcig gis chos thams cad shes par 'gyur ba yod dam zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:51b-36: kun rdzob gcig pus rang tshogs las //
T07TD4090.2E:51b-37: gzhan ni bdag med nyid rigs 'gyur //
T07TD4090.2E:51b-38: kun rdzob shes pas ni rang gi tshogs las gzhan pa'i chos thams cad ni bdag med ba'i zhes bdag med pa nyid du shes par 'gyur ro //
T07TD4090.2E:51b-39: de'i rang gi tshogs ni rang gi ngo bo dang de dang lhan cig tu 'byung ba'i chos rnams yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:51b-40: de dag ni yul dang yul can tha dad pa'i phyir dang /
T07TD4090.2E:51b-41: dmigs pa gcig pa'i phyir dang /
T07TD4090.2E:51b-42: ha cang nye ba'i phyir mi 'dzin to //
T07TD4090.2E:51b-43: de yang 'dod pa na spyod pa ni thos pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:51b-44: bsam pa las byung ba yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:51b-45: gzugs na spyod pa ni thos pa las byung ba yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:51b-46: bsgom pa las byung ba ni ma yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:52a-0: de ni sa rnam pa chad pa las @52a * //
T07TD4090.2E:52a-2: de lta ma yin na thams cad las cig car 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
T07TD4090.2E:52a-5: // / gang zhig shes pa du dang ldan //
T07TD4090.2E:52a-6: zhes bya ba 'di brjod bar bya ste /
T07TD4090.2E:52a-7: re zhig so so'i skye bo ni kun rdzob shes pa gcig bu dang ldan no //
T07TD4090.2E:52a-8: 'dod chags dang bral ba zhig yin na ni pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang yang ldan no //
T07TD4090.2E:52a-10: zag med skad cig dang po la //
T07TD4090.2E:52a-11: chags can shes pa gcig dang ldan //
T07TD4090.2E:52a-12: 'dod pa las 'dod chags dang ma bral ba zhig yin na /
T07TD4090.2E:52a-13: sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa la kun rdzob shes pa gcig kho na dang ldan pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:52a-15: sdug bsngal la chos shes pa la ni kun rdzob shes pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:52a-20: bzhi la re re 'phel dang ldan //
T07TD4090.2E:52a-21: de yan chad kyi skad cig ma bzhi la ni /
T07TD4090.2E:52a-22: de la shes pa re re /
T07TD4090.2E:52a-24: sdug bsngal la rjes su shes ba la ni rjes su shes pa 'phel la /
T07TD4090.2E:52a-27: lam la chos shes pa rnams la ni kun 'byung dang /
