T07TD4090.2E:52a-29: lam shes pa rnams 'phel bas lam la chos shes pa la shes pa bdun dang ldan pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:52a-30: 'dod chags dang bral ba zhig yin na ni thams cad du gzhan gyi sems shes pa lhag par ldan par rig par bya'o //
T07TD4090.2E:52a-31: yang na gnas skabs gang du shes pa du dag cig 'thob ce na /
T07TD4090.2E:52a-32: mthong ba'i lam la bzod pa dang //
T07TD4090.2E:52a-33: shes pa ji ltar skyes pa rnams //
T07TD4090.2E:52a-35: mthong ba'i lam la bzod pa'am /
T07TD4090.2E:52a-36: shes pa gang dang gang skyes pa de dang 'dra ba ma 'ongs pa de'i rnam pa bzhi kho na 'thob bar 'gyur ro //
T07TD4090.2E:52a-38: mthong ba'i lam la shes pa dang //
T07TD4090.2E:52a-39: rnam ba 'dra ba kho na 'thob ce na /
T07TD4090.2E:52a-40: rigs rnams ma thob pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:52a-42: rjes gsum la ni kun rdzob kyang //
T07TD4090.2E:52a-43: mthong ba'i lam de nyid la sdug bsngal dang /
T07TD4090.2E:52a-45: 'gog pa la rjes su shes ba gsum la kun rdzob shes pa yang 'thob bo //
T07TD4090.2E:52b-0: chos shes pa @52b la ni ma yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:52b-1: bden pa zad par mngon par ma rtogs ba'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:52b-2: de nyid kyi phyir mngon rtogs mtha' zhes bya ba /
T07TD4090.2E:52b-3: de nyid kyi phyir kun rdzob shes pa de ni mngon par rtogs pa'i mtha' las byung ba zhes bya ste /
T07TD4090.2E:52b-4: bden pa re re mngon par rtogs pa'i rjes la 'thob pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:52b-5: ci'i phyir lam la rjes su shes pa na 'thob bar mi 'gyur zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:52b-6: lam gyi bden ba ni sngon 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis mngon par ma rtogs pa'i phyir dang /
T07TD4090.2E:52b-7: zad par mngon par ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:52b-8: sdug bsngal zad par yongs su shes par bya ba dang /
T07TD4090.2E:52b-9: kun 'byung spang bar bya ba dang ;
T07TD4090.2E:52b-10: 'gog pa mngon du bya bar ni nus kyi /
T07TD4090.2E:52b-11: lam ni zad par bsgom par mi nus pas mngon par rtogs pa'i mtha' med pa'i phyir /
T07TD4090.2E:52b-12: de ni mngon par rtogs pa'i mtha' las byung ba mi 'thob bo //
T07TD4090.2E:52b-13: de'i tshe kun 'byung ba la yang thams cad spangs pa ma yin pas mngon par rtogs ba'i mtha' las byung bar mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:52b-14: de'i bden pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba thams cad spangs pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:52b-15: lam ni rigs mang ba'i phyir /
T07TD4090.2E:52b-16: mthong bas spang ba'i gnyen por thams cad bsgom par mi nus pas khyad par cher yod do //
T07TD4090.2E:52b-17: gzhan dag na re mthong ba'i lam gyi 'khor yin pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro //
T07TD4090.2E:52b-18: 'di ni bsgrub par bya ba yin pa'i phyir shes par byed pa ma yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:52b-19: ci kun rdzob shes pa mngon par rtogs ba'i mtha' las byung ba de res 'ga' mngon sum du byed dam zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:52b-21: gcig kho nar de ni mi skye ba'i chos can yin /
T07TD4090.2E:52b-22: ji ltar na de thob pa yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:52b-23: ma rnyed pa las rnyed pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:52b-24: da ni gal te de mngon sum du bya ba mi nus pa kho na yin na ji ltar na de rnyed pa yin /
T07TD4090.2E:52b-26: gang gi phyir rnyed pa de'i phyir rnyed do zhes ston pa 'di ni sngon ma byung ba'i rnam pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:52b-27: de lta bas na de lta na ni thob pa mi 'grub pa nyid kyis sngon gyi slob dpon dag ji skad zer ba de lta na 'grub bar 'gyur ro //
T07TD4090.2E:52b-28: sngon gyi slob dpon dag ji skad zer zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:53a-0: 'jig rten las 'das ba'i lam gyi mthus de las langs nas 'jig rten pa'i shes pa ches khyad par du 'phags @53a * //
T07TD4090.2E:53a-1: pa bden pa la dmigs ba mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ba kun rdzob shes pa skye bar 'gyur ro //
T07TD4090.2E:53a-2: de mngon sum du 'gyur bar nus pa'i rten rnyed pa gang yin pa de nyid rnyed pa yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:53a-3: rigs rnyed na rigs las byung ba yang rnyed pa yin no zhes zer ro //
T07TD4090.2E:53a-4: bye brag tu smra ba rnams ni 'di mi 'dod do //
T07TD4090.2E:53a-5: sa du pa'i kun rdzob shes pa de 'thob ce na /
T07TD4090.2E:53a-7: rang dang 'gog pa mthong ba'i lam las sa gang pa yin pa sa de pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:53a-8: sa 'og ma pa'i kun rdzob shes pa 'thob ba ste /
T07TD4090.2E:53a-9: gal te mthong ba'i lam mi lcogs pa med pa'i sa pa zhig yin na ni /
T07TD4090.2E:53a-10: mi lcogs pa med pa'i sa pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:53a-13: de bzhin du mthong ba'i lam /
T07TD4090.2E:53a-14: bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa pa yin na sa bdun pa'i kun rdzob shes pa thob ba'i bar du'o //
T07TD4090.2E:53a-15: de yang dran ba nye bar gzhag pa du dag cig yin zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:53a-17: 'gog pa'i mngon par rtogs pa'i kun rdzob shes pa gang yin pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa tha ma ste /
T07TD4090.2E:53a-18: chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:53a-19: gcig grangs bcad pas lhag ma ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi char yin no zhes bya bar grub pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:53a-20: kun rdzob shes pa mngon par rtogs pa'i mtha' las byung ba de ni rang bden rnams can /
T07TD4090.2E:53a-21: bden pa gang zhig mngon bar rtogs pa'i 'thob pa bden pa de'i rnam pa can kho na yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:53a-22: de'i rnam pa can yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:53a-23: zhes smos pas 'di'i dmigs pa yang bden pa de nyid yin no zhes bshad pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:53a-24: de ni mthong ba'i lam gyis 'thob par bya ba yin pa'i phyir 'bad las byung ba sbyor ba las byung ba yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T07TD4090.2E:53a-25: 'khor dang bcas pa la sogs pa smos pa'i phyir /
T07TD4090.2E:53a-26: 'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa ni phung po bzhi dang lnga'i rang bzhin yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:53a-27: chags bcas bcu drug pa la drug /'thob ces bya bar sbyar te /
T07TD4090.2E:53a-28: 'dod chags dang ma bral ba ni bcu drug pa lam la rjes su shes pa las shes pa gnyis da ltar byung ba yin la /
T07TD4090.2E:53b-0: sdug bsngal @53b dang kun 'byung dang 'gog pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:53b-2: 'dod la chags dang bral bas bdun //
T07TD4090.2E:53b-3: 'dod chags dang bral bas ni bdun pa pha rol gyi sems shes pa 'thob bo //
T07TD4090.2E:53b-4: de yi gong ma chags bcas kyi //
T07TD4090.2E:53b-5: bsgom ba'i lam la bdun 'thob po //
T07TD4090.2E:53b-6: skad cig ma bcu drug gi gong ma'i bsgom pa'i lam la ni ji srid du 'dod pa las 'dod chags dang bral bam yin pa de srid du sbyor ba dang /
T07TD4090.2E:53b-9: khyad par can gyi lam thams cad la shes pa bdun 'thob ste /
T07TD4090.2E:53b-15: lam dang kun rdzob shes pa rnams so //
T07TD4090.2E:53b-16: gal te bsgom ba'i lam 'jig rten pa zhig yin na ni kun rdzob shes pa da ltar byung ba yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:53b-17: gal te 'jig rten las 'das pa zhig yin na ni /
T07TD4090.2E:53b-18: chos shes pa bzhi las gang yang rung ba zhig da ltar byung ba yin no ;
T07TD4090.2E:53b-19: / sa bdun las rgyal mngon shes dang //
T07TD4090.2E:53b-20: mi g-yo 'thob dang spel bsgoms pa'i //
T07TD4090.2E:53b-21: bar chad med pa'i lam dag dang //
T07TD4090.2E:53b-22: gong ma'i grol ba'i lam brgyad la'ang //
T07TD4090.2E:53b-23: shes pa bdun 'thob bo zhes bya bar sbyar te /
T07TD4090.2E:53b-24: sa bdun ni bsam gtan bzhi dang /
T07TD4090.2E:53b-26: de dag las rgyal ba ni 'dod chags dang bral ba ste /
T07TD4090.2E:53b-27: slob pas bdun po de dag las 'dod chags dang bral ba dang /
T07TD4090.2E:53b-28: mngon par shes pa lnga dang /
T07TD4090.2E:53b-29: mi g-yo ba rtogs par byed pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:53b-30: bsam gtan spel mar bsgom pa'i bar chad med pa'i lam ji snyed ba de dag thams cad la shes pa bdun 'thob ste /
T07TD4090.2E:53b-32: gal te bsgom pa'i lam 'jig rten pa zhig yin na ni /
T07TD4090.2E:53b-33: kun rdzob shes pa da ltar byung ba yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:53b-34: 'jig rten las 'das pa zhig yin na ni rjes su shes pa bzhi dang chos shes pa gnyis las gang yang rung ba zhig da ltar byung ba yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:53b-35: mi g-yo ba rtogs par byed ba la ni kun rdzob shes pa mi 'thob ste ;
T07TD4090.2E:53b-36: srid pa'i tse mo'i gnyen po ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:53b-37: der ni zad pa shes ba bdun ba yin par rig par bya'o //
T07TD4090.2E:53b-38: sa bdun las 'dod chags dang bral ba'i yang gong ma srid pa'i rtse mo las 'dod chags dang bral pa'i rnam par grol ba'i lam brgyad la yang shes pa bdun kho na 'thob ste /
T07TD4090.2E:54a-7: pha rol gyi sems shes pa rnams so //
T07TD4090.2E:54a-8: kun rdzob shes pa ni mi 'thob ste /
T07TD4090.2E:54a-9: srid pa'i rtse mo'i gnyen po ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:54a-10: rjes su shes pa rnam pa bzhi dang /
T07TD4090.2E:54a-11: chos shes pa rnam pa gnyis las gang yang rung ba zhig da ltar byung ba yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:54a-12: slob pa sbyong ba'i grol ba la //
T07TD4090.2E:54a-13: shes pa drug dang bdun 'thob bam //
T07TD4090.2E:54a-14: slob pa 'dod chags dang bcas pas ni dbang po sbyor ba'i rnam par grol ba'i lam la drug 'thob ste /
T07TD4090.2E:54a-21: 'dod chags dang bral bas ni pha rol gyi sems shes pa bsnan te /
T07TD4090.2E:54a-23: 'am zhes bya ba'i sgra ni kha cig na re gnyi gas kun rdzob shes pa yang 'thob bo zhes zer ba'i lugs tha dad pa shes par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:54a-24: sbyor ba'i lam la ni de gnyis kyis kun rdzob shes pa yang 'thob bo //
T07TD4090.2E:54a-25: bar chad med pa'i lam la drug / slob pa 'dod chags dang bral ba yang rung /
T07TD4090.2E:54a-26: 'dod chags dang ma bral ba yang rung /
T07TD4090.2E:54a-27: dbang po sbyor ba'i bar chad med pa'i lam la drug 'thob ste /
T07TD4090.2E:54a-29: kun rdzob shes pa ni ma yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:54a-30: mthong ba'i lam dang 'dra ba'i phyir /
T07TD4090.2E:54a-31: pha rol gyi sems shes pa yang ma yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:54a-32: bar chad med pa'i lam thams cad la bkag pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:54a-33: ci'i phyir bkag pa ci zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:54a-34: gnyen po ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:54a-35: de bzhin srid rtse'i rnam rgyal la //
T07TD4090.2E:54a-36: srid pa'i rtse mo las 'dod chags dang bral ba'i bar chad med pa'i lam rnams la yang de bzhin du drug 'thob bo //
T07TD4090.2E:54a-37: zad pa shes pa la dgu'o //
T07TD4090.2E:54a-38: srid pa'i rtse mo las 'dod chags dang bral ba la rnam par grol ba'i lam dgu pa ni zad pa shes pa yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:54a-39: de la mi skye ba shes pa ma gtogs pa shes pa dgu 'thob po //
T07TD4090.2E:54a-40: mi g-yo bas ni bcu 'thob bo //
T07TD4090.2E:54a-41: mi g-yo ba'i chos can gang yin pa des ni bcu 'thob ste /
T07TD4090.2E:54a-42: mi skye ba shes pa 'thob pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:54a-43: der 'pho ba'i grol ba tha ma la'ang //
T07TD4090.2E:54b-0: gang zhig mi g-yo ba nyid du 'pho ba de'i rnam par grol ba'i lam tha ma la yang bcu 'thob @54b bo ;
T07TD4090.2E:54b-1: / bshad pa'i lhag ma la brgyad 'thob bo //
T07TD4090.2E:54b-2: lhag ma yang gang zhig ce na /
T07TD4090.2E:54b-3: 'dod pa'i khams las 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rnam par grol ba'i lam dgu pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:54b-4: sa bdun las 'dod chags dang bral ba dang /
T07TD4090.2E:54b-5: mngon par shes pa dang spel mar bsgom pa dag gis rnam par grol ba'i lam rnams dang /
T07TD4090.2E:54b-6: mi g-yo ba rtogs par byed pa'i rnam par grol ba'i lam brgyad dang /
T07TD4090.2E:54b-7: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sbyor ba dang /
T07TD4090.2E:54b-8: khyad par can gyi lam thams cad de /
T07TD4090.2E:54b-9: de dag thams cad la ni zad pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:54b-10: mi skye ba shes pa ma gtogs pa shes pa brgyad ma 'ongs pa 'thob pas 'thob pa ste /
T07TD4090.2E:54b-11: slob pa ni de lta bu yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:54b-12: mi slob pa'i mngon pa shes pa la sogs pa'i sbyor ba dang /
T07TD4090.2E:54b-14: khyad par can gyi lam rnams la shes pa dgu 'am bcu 'thob bo //
T07TD4090.2E:54b-15: mngon par shes pa dang spel mar bsgom pa'i bar chad med pa'i lam rnams la ni brgyad dam dgu 'thob po //
T07TD4090.2E:54b-16: mngon par shes pa'i rnam par grol ba'i lam gnyis ni lung du ma bstan pa'i phyir ma 'ongs pa cung zad kyang mi 'thob bo //
T07TD4090.2E:54b-17: so so'i skye bo ni 'dod pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:54b-18: bsam gtan gsum las 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rnam par grol ba'i lam tha ma rnams dang /
T07TD4090.2E:54b-19: bsam gtan gyis pa dag gi sbyor ba rnams dang /
T07TD4090.2E:54b-20: mngon par shes pa gsum gyi rnam par grol ba'i lam rnams dang /
T07TD4090.2E:54b-21: tshad med pa la sogs pa'i yon tan mngon par sgrub pa rnams la kun rdzob shes pa ma 'ongs pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:54b-22: nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa dag gi sbyor ba rnams dang /
T07TD4090.2E:54b-23: mngon par shes pa gsum gyi rnam par grol ba ma gtogs pa pha rol gyi sems shes pa yang 'thob bo //
T07TD4090.2E:54b-24: de dag la ni gzhan gyi sems shes pa yang mi 'thob ste /
T07TD4090.2E:54b-25: mthong ba'i lam gyi 'khor yin pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:54b-26: sngon med pa'i lam thob pa gzhan la ni kun rdzob shes pa kho na ma 'ongs pa 'thob bo //
T07TD4090.2E:54b-27: yang lam gang las du pa'i shes pa thob ce na /
T07TD4090.2E:54b-28: re zhig kun rdzob shes pa ni lam sa gang pa'i yin pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:54b-29: dang po nyid du sa gang 'thob pas de pa'i ma 'ongs pa 'thob bo //
T07TD4090.2E:54b-30: zag pa med pa'i lam gang yin pa 'ba' zhig tu yang ma zad do //
T07TD4090.2E:54b-31: 'o na ji lta bu zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:55a-3: sa gang las 'dod chags dang bral ba la yang lam yang sbyor ba'i lam la sogs pa rnam pa gnyis yin la /
T07TD4090.2E:55a-4: 'dod chags dang bral ba sa gang zhig thob ba de'i sa ba dang sa 'og ma ba'i zag pa med pa'i shes pa rnams 'thob par 'gyur ro //
T07TD4090.2E:55a-5: zad pa shes la zag bcas kyang //
T07TD4090.2E:55a-6: sa kun zad pa shes pa la ni zad pa shes pas 'thob pa zag pa dang bcas pa'i yon tan mi sdug pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:55a-8: rngub pa rjes su dran pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:55a-9: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:55a-11: rnam par thar pa la sogs pas thams cad sprog ma thag pa bcad de /
T07TD4090.2E:55a-12: dbugs phyin pa lta bu dang /
T07TD4090.2E:55a-14: rgyal srid chen po thob na /
T07TD4090.2E:55a-15: yul gyi mi rnams kyis dbul bar bya bas bsu ba bzhin du rang gi sems la rgyal srid chen po nyid 'thob pa la dge ba'i chos thams cad 'thob pa rnams kyis bsu ba'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:55a-16: gang ci rnyed pa de thams cad 'thob bam zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:55a-18: gang sngon med pa las rnyed pa yin pas /
T07TD4090.2E:55a-20: sngon rnyed zin pa ni mi 'thob bo //
T07TD4090.2E:55a-21: gang rnam par nyams pa las yang rnyed ba de yang mi 'thob ste /
T07TD4090.2E:55a-22: thob pa btang ba'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:55a-23: ci 'thob pa rnyed pa kho na yin nam zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:55a-25: 'thob pa ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
T07TD4090.2E:55a-30: de la rnyed pa dang bsten ces bya ba ni /
T07TD4090.2E:55a-32: gnyen po dang ni thag bsring ba'i //
T07TD4090.2E:55a-33: 'thob pa zag dang bcas pa'i yin //
T07TD4090.2E:55a-34: rnyed pa dang bsten pa 'thob pa dag ni dge ba 'dus byas rnams kyi yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:55a-35: ma 'ongs pa rnams kyi ni gcig go //
T07TD4090.2E:55a-36: da ltar byung ba rnams kyi ni gnyi ga'o //
T07TD4090.2E:55a-37: gnyen po dang thag bsring ba 'thob pa dag ni /
T07TD4090.2E:55a-38: zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams kyi yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:55a-39: de ltar na dge ba zag pa dang bcas pa rnams kyi ni 'thob pa bzhi yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:55a-40: zag pa med pa rnams dang /
T07TD4090.2E:55a-41: nyon mongs pa thams cad dang /
T07TD4090.2E:55a-42: lung du ma bstan pa rnams kyi ni gnyis yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:55a-43: chos mngon pa pa nyi 'og pa rnams kyi ltar na 'thob pa drug ste /
T07TD4090.2E:55b-2: snga ma ni dbang po rnams kyi yin la /
T07TD4090.2E:55b-3: phyi ma ni lus kyi yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:55b-4: dbang po drug po 'di dag shin tu dul ba dang /
T07TD4090.2E:55b-5: shin tu bsgoms pa zhes bya ba'i bar dang /
T07TD4090.2E:55b-6: de bzhin du lus 'di la skra yang yod ces bya ba rgyas par gsungs pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:55b-7: gang dag kha che ba rnams na re de gnyis ni gnyen po dang thag bsring ba 'thob pa'i khongs su 'dus so zhes zer ro //
T07TD4090.2E:55b-8: gang zag thams cad kyis zad pa shes pa'i tshe /
T07TD4090.2E:55b-9: yon tan 'thob pa'i phyir bshad kyi //
T07TD4090.2E:55b-10: sangs rgyas chos ni ma 'dres pa //
T07TD4090.2E:55b-11: stobs la sogs pa bco brgyad do //
T07TD4090.2E:55b-12: gang dag sangs rgyas kho nas zad pa mkhyen pa'i tshe brnyes par 'gyur gyi gzhan gyis ni ma yin pa'o //
T07TD4090.2E:55b-16: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang /
T07TD4090.2E:55b-18: thun mong ma yin pas na ma 'dres pa zhes bya'o //
T07TD4090.2E:55b-20: gnas dang gnas min shes pa bcu //
T07TD4090.2E:55b-21: gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs ni shes pa bcu yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:55b-23: las dang rnam par smin pa 'am mkhyen pa'i stobs ni shes pa brgyad de /
T07TD4090.2E:55b-24: 'gog pa dang lam shes pa dag ma gtogs so //
T07TD4090.2E:55b-26: dbang po mos dang khams la ni /
T07TD4090.2E:55b-31: snyoms par 'jug pa mkhyen pa'i stobs ni shes pa dgu yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:55b-32: 'gog pa shes pa ma gtogs so //
T07TD4090.2E:55b-33: dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
T07TD4090.2E:55b-34: mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
T07TD4090.2E:55b-35: khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs kyang de bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T07TD4090.2E:55b-37: 'am zhes bya ba'i sgra ni dgu 'am zhes lugs tha dad pa'i don te /
T07TD4090.2E:55b-38: gal te lam de 'bras bu dang bcas par gzung na ni thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen ba'i stobs shes pa bcu'o //
T07TD4090.2E:55b-39: gal te ma yin na ni dgu ste /
T07TD4090.2E:55b-40: 'gog pa shes pa ma gtogs so //
T07TD4090.2E:55b-41: gnyis ni kun rdzob shes pa yin //
T07TD4090.2E:55b-42: sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
T07TD4090.2E:55b-44: skye ba mkhyen pa'i stobs ni kun rdzob shes pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:56a-2: gal te zag pa zad pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa kho na zhig yin na ni zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs shes pa drug yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:56a-7: mi skye ba shes pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:56a-8: kun rdzob shes pa rnams so //
T07TD4090.2E:56a-9: 'on te zad pa shes pa zad pa zad pa'i rgyud la yod pa'i shes pa yin na ni /
T07TD4090.2E:56a-10: des na shes pa bcu yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:56a-12: da ni sa brjod par bya ste /
T07TD4090.2E:56a-13: sngon gnas shi 'pho skye ba'i stobs //
T07TD4090.2E:56a-15: 'chi 'pho ba ni 'chi 'pho ba kho na ste /
T07TD4090.2E:56a-17: shi 'pho dang skye ba mkhyen pa'i stobs ni bsam gtan bzhi'i sa ba yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:56a-18: lhag ma ni sa rnams kun na //
T07TD4090.2E:56a-19: stobs lhag ma ni sa thams cad kyis bsdus pa yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:56a-20: de dag kyang 'dod pa'i khams dang /
T07TD4090.2E:56a-21: mi lcogs pa med pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:56a-22: bsam gtan khyad par can dang /
T07TD4090.2E:56a-25: thams cad kyang 'dzam bu'i gling gi skyes pa'i rten can yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:56a-26: gzhan du sangs rgyas mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:56a-27: shes pa rnam pa bcu po 'di nyid gzhan gyi ni stobs zhes mi bya'o /
T07TD4090.2E:56a-28: sangs rgyas kho na'i stobs zhes bya'o //
T07TD4090.2E:56a-30: 'di'i stobs gang phyir thogs mi mnga' //
T07TD4090.2E:56a-31: gang gi phyir 'di'i mkhyen pa shes bya thams cad la thogs pa mi mnga' bar 'jug pa de'i phyir stobs yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:56a-32: gzhan dag gi shes pa ni la lar 'dod kyang mi 'jug pa'i phyir /
T07TD4090.2E:56a-33: thogs pa yin pas de ni stobs zhes bya ba'i ming thob par 'os pa ma yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:56a-34: 'dir dpe ni gnas brtan sh'a ri'i bus rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa'i mi phyir btang ba dang /
T07TD4090.2E:56a-35: bya zhig khras gtses pa skye ba la sogs pa'i mtha' ma shes pa lta bu yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:56a-36: re zhig de ltar na mkhyen pa la thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i phyir /
T07TD4090.2E:56a-37: sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs kyi stobs ni shes bzhin du mtha' yas pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:56a-38: sku la sred med bu yi stobs //
T07TD4090.2E:56a-39: sangs rgyas kyi sku la ni srid med bu'i stobs mnga'o zhes brjod do //
T07TD4090.2E:56a-41: gzhan dag na re tshigs dang tshigs na sred med kyi bu'i stobs mnga'o zhes zer ro //
T07TD4090.2E:56b-0: btsun pa na re @56b sku'i stobs kyang thugs kyi stobs bzhin du mtha' yas pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:56b-1: de lta ma yin na mkhyen pa'i stobs mtha' yas pas bzod par mi 'gyur ro zhes zer ro //
T07TD4090.2E:56b-2: sangs rgyas dang rang sangs rgyas dang 'khor los sgyur ba rnams kyi tshigs kyi mdud pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:56b-4: gzar bus btab pa lta bu dag yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:56b-5: sred med kyi bu'i stobs kyi tshad ji tsam zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:56b-6: glang chen sogs bdun cus glags pa'i stobs yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:56b-7: glang po che phal pa bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni spos kyi glang po che gcig gi stobs yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:56b-8: de bzhin du tshan po che chen po dang /
T07TD4090.2E:56b-12: sred med kyi bu rnams gong nas gong du bcu 'gyur du bskyed de brjod par bya'o //
T07TD4090.2E:56b-13: gzhan dag na re glang po che phal ba dang /
T07TD4090.2E:56b-14: spos kyi glang po che dang /
T07TD4090.2E:56b-15: tshan po che chen po dang /
T07TD4090.2E:56b-18: stobs mchog rnams gong nas gong du bcu 'gyur du bskyed pa ni sred med kyi bu'i stobs kyi phyed yin la /
T07TD4090.2E:56b-19: de gnyis su bsgyur ba ni sred med kyi bu'i stobs yin no zhes zer te /
T07TD4090.2E:56b-20: ji ltar ches che ba de ltar rung ngo //
T07TD4090.2E:56b-21: de ni reg bya'i skye mched do //
T07TD4090.2E:56b-22: lus kyi stobs de ni thams cad kyang reg bya'i skye mched kyi rang bzhin 'byung ba chen po'i khyad par kho na yin par rig par bya'o //
T07TD4090.2E:56b-23: gzhan dag na re bdun las don gzhan du gyur pa rgyur byas pa'i gzugs yin no zhes zer ro //
T07TD4090.2E:56b-25: mi 'jigs pa ni rnam pa bzhi //
T07TD4090.2E:56b-26: mdo las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin no //
T07TD4090.2E:56b-27: mi 'jigs pa bzhi po de dag kyang /
T07TD4090.2E:56b-28: ji ltar stobs ni dang po dang bcu pa gnyis pa bdun pa bzhin no //
T07TD4090.2E:56b-29: gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs ji lta bar /
T07TD4090.2E:56b-30: kye mang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pa la zhes bya ba'i mi 'jigs pa 'di yang de dang 'dra bar rig par bya'o //
T07TD4090.2E:56b-31: zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs ji lta bar kye mang zag pa zad par gyur pa la zhes bya ba'i mi 'jigs pa 'di yang de dang 'dra'o //
T07TD4090.2E:56b-32: las bdag gir bya ba mkhyen pa'i stobs ji lta bar ngas gang dag nyan thos rnam la bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa la zhes bya ba'i mi 'jigs pa 'di yang de dang 'dra'o //
T07TD4090.2E:57a-1: du 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen pa'i stobs ji lta bar das gang nyan thos rnams kyi nges par 'byung ba'i lam du gsungs pa la zhes bya ba'i mi 'jigs pa 'di yang de dang 'dra bar rig par bya'o //
T07TD4090.2E:57a-2: ji ltar na mkhyen pa nyid mi 'jigs pa yin zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:57a-3: mi 'jigs pa ni mi skrag pa yin la /
T07TD4090.2E:57a-4: 'di dag gis kyang mi skrag par 'gyur ro //
T07TD4090.2E:57a-5: shes pas byas pa ni mi 'jigs par rung gi shes pa nyid ni ma yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:57a-6: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni 'khor gyi bye brag las gsum yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:57a-7: mdo las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin no //
T07TD4090.2E:57a-8: de yang dran pa shes rab dag nyid gsum //
T07TD4090.2E:57a-9: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum po 'di dag ni dran pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:57a-10: shes bzhin gyi rang bzhin dag yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:57a-11: gang gi tshe nyan thos dag kyang gus par nyan pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:57a-12: gus par mi nyan pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:57a-13: gnyi ga la kun du dga' ba'am /
T07TD4090.2E:57a-14: kun nas mnar sems mi 'byung ba na /
T07TD4090.2E:57a-16: 'di dag sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams zhes bya zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:57a-17: bag chags dang bcas par spangs pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:57a-18: yang na nyan thos rnams gang yin pa de la ni gus par nyan pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:57a-19: gus par mi nyan pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:57a-20: gnyis po de dag la shin tu yang yid bde ba la sogs pa'i go skabs su mi 'gyur gyi /
T07TD4090.2E:57a-21: gzhan la ni de lta ma yin pas de kho na la de mi 'byung ba ya mtshan du rnam par gzhag gi gzhan la ni ma yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:57a-22: da ni thugs rje chen po brjod par bya ste /
T07TD4090.2E:57a-24: thugs rje chen po kun rdzob blo //
T07TD4090.2E:57a-25: thugs rje chen po ni kun rdzob shes pa'i bdag nyid yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:57a-26: de lta ma yin na sems can thams cad la dmigs par yang mi 'grub la /
T07TD4090.2E:57a-27: snying rje bzhin du sdug bsngal gsum gyi rnam pa can du yang mi 'grub bo //
T07TD4090.2E:57a-28: 'di ci'i phyir thugs rje chen po zhes bya zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:57a-29: tshogs dang rnam pa spyod yul dang //
T07TD4090.2E:57a-30: mnyam pa'i phyir dang ches che'i phyir //
T07TD4090.2E:57a-31: tshogs ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen pos yang dag par 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:57a-32: rnam pa ni sdug bsngal gsum la rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:57a-33: dmigs pa ni khams gsum pa'i sems can la dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:57b-0: mnyam pa nyid ni sems can thams cad la 'dra bar 'jug pa'i phyir @57b ro ;
T07TD4090.2E:57b-1: / ches che ba nyid ni de bas cha ba med pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:57b-2: snying rje dang thugs rje chen po gnyis la tha dad du bya ba ni ci zhig yod ce na /
T07TD4090.2E:57b-3: tha dad bya ba rnam pa brgyad /
T07TD4090.2E:57b-4: ngo bo nyid las ni zhe sdang med pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:57b-5: gti mug med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:57b-6: rnam pa las ni sdug bsngal gcig dang /
T07TD4090.2E:57b-7: gsum gyi rnam pa can yin pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:57b-8: dmigs pa las ni khams gcig dang /
T07TD4090.2E:57b-9: gsum gyi sems can la dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:57b-10: sa las ni bsam gtan bzhi dang /
T07TD4090.2E:57b-11: bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:57b-12: rgyud las ni nyan thos la sogs pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:57b-13: sangs rgyas kyi rgyud las skye ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:57b-14: thob pa las ni 'dod pa'i khams dang /
T07TD4090.2E:57b-15: srid pa'i rtse mo las 'dod chags dang bral bas thob pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:57b-16: yongs su mi skyob pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:57b-18: mi 'dra ba dang 'dra bar thugs rje mdzad pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:57b-19: ci sangs rgyas thams cad rnam pa thams cad kyis mnyam ba yin nam zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:57b-20: sangs rgyas thams cad tshogs dang ni //
T07TD4090.2E:57b-21: chos sku 'gro ba'i don spyod pas //
T07TD4090.2E:57b-22: mnyam pa nyid de sku tshe dang //
T07TD4090.2E:57b-23: rigs dang sku bong tshod kyis min //
T07TD4090.2E:57b-24: sangs rgyas thams cad ni rgyu gsum po sngon gyi bsod nams dang /
T07TD4090.2E:57b-25: ye shes kyi tshogs kyis yang dag par 'grub pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:57b-26: chos kyi sku yongs su 'grub pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:57b-27: 'jig rten gyi don spyod pas mnyam pa nyid yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:57b-31: sku bong tshod du mdzad pa la ni bye brag yod de dus ji lta ba bzhin du yun shin tu ring ba dang /
T07TD4090.2E:57b-34: bram ze'i rigs tha dad pa'i phyir dang /
T07TD4090.2E:57b-35: 'od srungs dang sh'akya la sogs pa gdung tha dad pa'i phyir dang /
T07TD4090.2E:57b-36: sku bong tshod chung ba dang /
T07TD4090.2E:57b-37: chung ba ma yin pa tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:57b-38: phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa gsum po 'di kho na yid la byed pa mkhas pas ni /
T07TD4090.2E:57b-39: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la dga' ba dang /
T07TD4090.2E:57b-40: gus pa chen po skyed par nus te /
T07TD4090.2E:57b-42: rgyu phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:57b-43: 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:57b-44: phan 'dogs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:57b-45: ye shes phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T07TD4090.2E:58a-0: de la rgyu phun sum tshogs pa @58a * //
T07TD4090.2E:58a-3: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs thams cad la goms pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:58a-4: yun ring po nas goms pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:58a-5: bar chad med par goms pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:58a-6: gus par byas te goms pa'o //
T07TD4090.2E:58a-7: 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam pa ba ni ste /
T07TD4090.2E:58a-8: ye shes phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:58a-9: spang ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:58a-10: mthu phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:58a-11: gzugs kyi sku phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T07TD4090.2E:58a-12: phan 'dogs pa phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam pa bzhi ste /
T07TD4090.2E:58a-13: ngan song gsum dang 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las gtan du thar bar mdzad pa phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T07TD4090.2E:58a-14: yang na theg pa gsum dang bde 'gro la 'god par mdzad pa phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T07TD4090.2E:58a-15: ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam pa bzhi ste /
T07TD4090.2E:58a-16: ma bstan par mkhyen pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:58a-18: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:58a-20: spangs pa phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam pa bzhi ste /
T07TD4090.2E:58a-21: nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:58a-23: bag chags dang bcas te spangs pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:58a-24: ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgrib ba thams cad spangs pa'o //
T07TD4090.2E:58a-25: mthu phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam pa bzhi ste /
T07TD4090.2E:58a-29: byin gyis rlob pa'i mnga' phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:58a-30: sgrib pa dang nam mkha' dang shin tu ring ba la myur du gshegs pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:58a-31: chung ngur mang po 'jug par mdzad pa'i mnga' phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:58a-32: ya mtshan gyi chos nar ma rnam ba sna tshogs phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T07TD4090.2E:58a-33: gzugs kyi sku phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam pa bzhi ste /
T07TD4090.2E:58a-34: mtshan phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:58a-35: dpe byad bzang po phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:58a-36: stobs phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:58a-37: sku gdung rdo rje ltar sra ba nyid phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T07TD4090.2E:58a-38: de ltar na de dag ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi che ba'i bdag nyid mdor bsdus pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:58a-39: de dbyen ni mtha' yas par 'gyur te /
T07TD4090.2E:58a-40: de yang bcom ldan 'das rnams kho na nas gal te sku tshe bskal pa grangs med pa du mar byin gyis brlabs par gyur na mtha' dag mkhyen pa dang brjod par spyod do //
T07TD4090.2E:58b-0: re zhig @58b de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni yon tan dang ye shes dang mthu dang phan 'dogs pa mtha' yas shing rmad du byung ba ni rin po che chen po'i 'byung gnas yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:58b-1: 'on kyang byis pa rang nyid yon tan dbul bas mos pa bcom pa rnams ni yon tan 'byor pa de lta bu de thos su zin kyang sangs rgyas dang de'i chos la gus par mi byed kyi /
T07TD4090.2E:58b-2: mkhas pa rnams ni rkang yan chad nas kyang /
T07TD4090.2E:58b-3: bcom ldan 'das de dang de'i chos la mngon par rab tu dang bar 'gyur te /
T07TD4090.2E:58b-4: gcig tu rab tu dang ba de dag ni dang ba tsam gyis kyang rnam par smin par ma nges pa'i sdig pa'i tshogs rnams zil gyis mnan te lha dang mi'i legs pa nyams su myong nas bgrod par bya ba'i mchog mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ro //
T07TD4090.2E:58b-5: de nyid kyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni bsod nams kyi zhing bla na med pa zhes bya ste /
T07TD4090.2E:58b-6: 'bras bu med pa ma yin pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:58b-12: gang dag rgyal ba rnam 'dren la //
T07TD4090.2E:58b-13: bya ba chung ngu byed 'gyur ba'ang //
T07TD4090.2E:58b-14: de dag mtho ris sna tshogs dag / bgrod nas bdud rtsi'i go 'phang 'thob //
T07TD4090.2E:58b-16: re zhig de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ces bya'o //
T07TD4090.2E:58b-17: chos gzhan slob dang thun mong min //
T07TD4090.2E:58b-18: sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon tan gzhan dag ni nyan thos dang thun mong yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:58b-19: kha cig so so'i skye bo dang /
T07TD4090.2E:58b-20: de dag kyang gang zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:58b-22: nyon mongs med dang smon nas shes //
T07TD4090.2E:58b-23: so so yang dag rig sngon sogs //
T07TD4090.2E:58b-24: nyon mongs pa med pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:58b-26: so so yang dag par rig pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:58b-32: zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang /
T07TD4090.2E:58b-33: zad par gyi skye mched la sogs pa'o //
T07TD4090.2E:58b-34: de la nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya ba ni dgra bcom pa la sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal ni nyon mongs pa las rab tu skye ba dang /
T07TD4090.2E:58b-35: bdag nyid kyang yon gnas gyi [*kyi] khyad par yin par rig nas pha rol po dag de la dmigs nas /
T07TD4090.2E:59a-0: nyon mongs pa skye ba yongs su spangs @59a * //
T07TD4090.2E:59a-2: gang gis na pha rol po dag rnam pa thams cad du nyon mongs pa skye bar mi byed cing 'ga' yang de la dmigs nas 'dod chags sam /
T07TD4090.2E:59a-4: nga rgyal skye bar mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i shes pa skyed bar byed pa ste /
T07TD4090.2E:59a-5: lam de ni 'ga' yang nyon mongs pa skyed par mi byed pas na nyon mongs pa med pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:59a-6: nyon mongs pa med par de ni /
T07TD4090.2E:59a-8: de'i rang bzhin ni 'di yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:59a-9: bsam gtan mtha' na bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa pa yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:59a-10: lam sla ba rnams kyi mchog yin pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:59a-12: dgra bcom pa gzhan gyis ni ma yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:59a-13: gzhan ni res 'ga' rang gi rgyud las kyang nyon mongs pa mtha' dag yongs su spang bar mi nus so //
T07TD4090.2E:59a-15: gling gsum du mi dag gi nang kho nar skyed par byed do //
T07TD4090.2E:59a-17: ma skyed gzhir bcas spyod yul can /
T07TD4090.2E:59a-18: 'di'i dmigs pa ni nyon mongs pa 'dod pa na spyod pa ma 'ongs pa gzhi dang bcas pa rnams yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:59a-19: pha rol po dag nyon mongs pa skye bar ma gyur cig ces bya ba de ltar zhugs pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:59a-20: nyon mongs pa gzhi med pa rnams ni yongs su spang bar mi nus te /
T07TD4090.2E:59a-21: thams cad du 'gro ba rnams ne rang gis mtha' dag la dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:59a-22: nyon mongs pa med pa ji skad du bshad pa /
T07TD4090.2E:59a-23: smon nas shes pa'ang de bzhin no //
T07TD4090.2E:59a-24: de yang kun rdzob shes pa dang //
T07TD4090.2E:59a-25: bsam gtan mtha' na yod pa dang //
T07TD4090.2E:59a-26: mi g-yo ba'i chos can gyi yin pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:59a-28: de'i dmigs pa thams cad do //
T07TD4090.2E:59a-29: smon nas shes pa'i dmigs pa ni chos thams cad yin bas 'di ni bye brag yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:59a-30: bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re smon nas shes pa gzugs med pa rnams mngon sum du mi shes so //
T07TD4090.2E:59a-31: 'o na ji lta bu zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:59a-32: rgyu mthun pa dang spyod pa'i bye brag las shes te /
T07TD4090.2E:59a-33: 'dir dpe ni zhing ba lta bu'o zhes zer ro //
T07TD4090.2E:59a-34: smon pa sngar btang ba'i shes pa ni smon nas shes pa ste /
T07TD4090.2E:59a-35: 'di shes par bya'o snyam du smon nas rab kyi mtha'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug cing /
T07TD4090.2E:59a-36: ting nge 'dzin de'i yul du ji tsam zhig gyur pa gang yin pa de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa'o //
T07TD4090.2E:59b-0: @59b de bzhin chos don des tshig dang //
T07TD4090.2E:59b-1: spobs pa so so yang dag rig / so so yang dag par rig pa ni bzhi ste /
T07TD4090.2E:59b-2: chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:59b-3: don so so yang dag par rig pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:59b-4: nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:59b-5: spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa'o //
T07TD4090.2E:59b-6: de dag kyang nyon mongs pa med pa ji lta ba de dang 'dra'o //
T07TD4090.2E:59b-7: de dag gi de dang 'dra ba ci zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:59b-8: mi g-yo ba'i chos can gyi yin pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:59b-9: mi'i rten can nyid yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:59b-11: sa dang rang gi ngo bo'i bye brag ni tha dad par brjod de /
T07TD4090.2E:59b-12: gsum ni go rims bzhin ming dang //
T07TD4090.2E:59b-13: don dang ngag la thogs med shes //
T07TD4090.2E:59b-14: chos dang don dang nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni go rims bzhin du ming dang tshig dang yi ge'i tshogs rnams dang /
T07TD4090.2E:59b-15: don dang ngag la thogs pa med par shes pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:59b-16: bzhi pa rigs pa thags thogs med //
T07TD4090.2E:59b-17: mngon brjod lam la dbang nyid dang //
T07TD4090.2E:59b-18: thogs pa med par shes pa zhes bya bar sbyar te /
T07TD4090.2E:59b-19: spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa ni rigs pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:59b-20: thags thogs med par mngon par brjod pa nyid dang /
T07TD4090.2E:59b-21: ting nge 'dzin la dbang gsal bar bya ba la thogs pa med par shes pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:59b-22: de yi dmigs pa ngag dang lam //
T07TD4090.2E:59b-23: de'i dmigs pa ni ngag kyang yin la lam yang yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:59b-25: spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa ni shes pa dgu'i rang bzhin yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:59b-26: 'gog ba shes pa ma gtogs so //
T07TD4090.2E:59b-28: 'di ni ngag dang lam gnyis las gang yang rung pa zhig la dmigs pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i khams nas srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar sa thams cad ba yang yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:59b-29: yang dag don rig bcu 'am drug / don so so yang dag par rig pa ni gal te don chos thams cad yin na ni shes pa bcu yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:59b-30: gal te don mya ngan las 'das pa yan na ni shes pa drug ste /
T07TD4090.2E:59b-33: 'gog pa dang zad pa dang mi skye ba dang /
T07TD4090.2E:59b-34: kun rdzob shes pa rnams so //
T07TD4090.2E:59b-36: don so so yang dag par rig pa de ni sa thams cad pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:60a-0: gzhan chos dang nges pa'i tshigs so so yang dag par @60a * //
T07TD4090.2E:60a-1: rig pa gnyis ni kun rdzob shes pa'i rang bzhin dag yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:60a-2: ming gi tshogs la sogs pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:60a-3: ngag la dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:60a-4: chos rig 'dod dang bsam gtan na //
T07TD4090.2E:60a-5: chos so so yang dag par rig pa ni sa lnga po 'dod pa'i khams dang /
T07TD4090.2E:60a-6: bsam gtan bzhis bsdus pa yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:60a-7: yan chad na ming gi tshogs med pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:60a-8: ngag ni 'dod pa dang po na //
T07TD4090.2E:60a-9: ngag dang nges pa'i tshig ces bya ba ni don gcig go //
T07TD4090.2E:60a-10: nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa ni 'dad pa'i khams dang bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa dag yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:60a-11: yang chad na rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:60a-12: btags pa ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 'di skad du tshig dang yi ge dang /
T07TD4090.2E:60a-14: de nyid kyi gcig dang gnyis dang mang po dang pho dang mo la sogs pa'i tshig bla dags dang /
T07TD4090.2E:60a-15: de la thags thogs med par bya ba la thogs pa med par shes pa ni chos so so yang dag par rigs pa la sogs pa yin no zhes ston te /
T07TD4090.2E:60a-16: de nyid kyis 'di dag gi go rims grub pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:60a-17: tshig nges pa ni nges pa'i tshig ste /
T07TD4090.2E:60a-18: dper na gzugs su rung bas ni de'i phyir /
T07TD4090.2E:60a-19: gzugs zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:60a-20: gzhan dag na re lan dang lan la spobs pas na spobs pa yin no zhes zer ro //
T07TD4090.2E:60a-21: so so yang dag par rig pa 'di dag gi sngon gyi sbyor ba ni go rims bzhin du rtsis dang /
T07TD4090.2E:60a-24: gtan tshigs rig pa dag yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:60a-25: 'di dag la mkhas par ma byas bar de dag skyed par mi nus so zhes grag go //
T07TD4090.2E:60a-26: thams cad kyi sbyor ba sangs rgyas kyi bka' kho na yin no zhes brjod do //
T07TD4090.2E:60a-27: gang la gcig yod pa de la gdon mi za bar so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi char yod do //
T07TD4090.2E:60a-28: ma tshang bar ni de thob med //
T07TD4090.2E:60a-29: de dag ma tshang bar ni so so yang dag par rig pa 'thob pa ma yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:60a-30: nyon mongs pa med pa la sogs pa'i yon tan bstan pa gang dag yin pa /
T07TD4090.2E:60a-31: drug po de dag rab mtha' bas //
T07TD4090.2E:60a-32: de dag ni rab kyi mtha' pa'i bsam gtan gyi stobs kyis 'thob po //
T07TD4090.2E:60a-33: de ni rnam drug / bsam gtan bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' pa de yang nyon mongs pa med pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:60b-0: so so yang dag par @60b rig pa gsum dang /
T07TD4090.2E:60b-1: rab kyi mtha' pa de nyid dang drug gi bdag nyid yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:60b-2: nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa ni de'i stobs kyis 'thob pa yin gyi de bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa ba ni ma yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:60b-3: rab kyi mtha' pa zhes bya ba ni ci zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:60b-5: bsam gtan bzhi pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:60b-6: de ni sa kun gyis mthun pas //
T07TD4090.2E:60b-7: 'phel ba'i rab tu phyin pa yin //
T07TD4090.2E:60b-8: ji ltar nas thams cad kyis mthun par byas pa yin zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:60b-9: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sems las bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug la /
T07TD4090.2E:60b-10: de las ni bsam gtan gnyis pa ste /
T07TD4090.2E:60b-11: de bzhin du rim gyis 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched kyi bar la snyoms par 'jug go //
T07TD4090.2E:60b-12: mi mthun pa ni yang 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sems kyi bar la'o //
T07TD4090.2E:60b-13: de la yang bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar du mthun pa yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:60b-14: de ltar na sa thams cad kyis mthun par byas pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:60b-15: ji ltar na 'phel ba'i rab tu phyin pa'i bar du yin zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:60b-16: de ltar bsgoms pa chung ngu las 'bring /
T07TD4090.2E:60b-17: 'bring las chen po la snyoms par 'jug pa ste /
T07TD4090.2E:60b-18: 'phel ba'i mchog ni 'phel ba'i rab yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:60b-19: bsam gtan 'di lta bu 'di ni rab kyi mtha' pa yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:60b-20: 'di la mthar rab tu phyin pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:60b-21: 'dir mtha' ni 'phel ba 'am rnam pa yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:60b-23: yon tan drug po de dag kyang //
T07TD4090.2E:60b-24: sangs rgyas las gzhan sbyor las skyes //
T07TD4090.2E:60b-25: sangs rgyas las gzhan pa ni sbyor ba las byung ba yin gyi 'dod chags dang bral bas thob pa ni ma yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:60b-26: sangs rgyas kyi ni sbyor ba las byung ba cung zad kyang med de /
T07TD4090.2E:60b-27: 'dod chags can gyi dbang phyug yin pa'i phyir /
T07TD4090.2E:60b-28: de'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad mngon du gyur pa ni bzhed pa tsam la rag las pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:60b-29: re zhig de dag ni nyan thos dang /
T07TD4090.2E:60b-30: thun mong pa'i yon tan dag yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:60b-31: mngon par shes pa la sogs pa ni so so'i skye bo dag dang yang thun mong yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:60b-32: mngon par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ci zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:60b-33: rdzu 'phrul rna ba yid dang ni //
T07TD4090.2E:60b-35: zad shes mngon du bya ba yi //
T07TD4090.2E:61a-0: mngon shes rnam pa drug / rdzu 'phrul gyi yul shes pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes @61a * //
T07TD4090.2E:61a-4: sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:61a-7: zag pa zad pa shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa ste /
T07TD4090.2E:61a-8: de dag ni mngon par shes pa drug yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:61a-9: de dag las lnga ni so so'i skye bo rnams dang thun mong ba yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:61a-12: dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu bzhin du /
T07TD4090.2E:61a-13: rnam par grol ba'i lam gyi shes rab kyi rang bzhin yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:61a-14: bzhi ni kun rdzob shes pa ste //
T07TD4090.2E:61a-16: zag pa zad pa shes pa'i mngon par shes pa ma gtogs so //
T07TD4090.2E:61a-17: sems la shes pa lnga yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:61a-18: sems kyi rnam grangs mngon par shes pa ni lnga yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:61a-22: pha rol gyi sems shes pa rnams so //
T07TD4090.2E:61a-23: zag pa mngon shes stobs bzhin no //
T07TD4090.2E:61a-24: 'di ni zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs ji skad du bshad pa de bzhin du shes pa drug gam bcu yin bde yang rig par bya la /
T07TD4090.2E:61a-25: de bzhin du 'di ni sa thams cad pa yin par yang shes par bya'o //
T07TD4090.2E:61a-27: lnga ni bsam gtan bzhi dag na /
T07TD4090.2E:61a-28: mngon par shes pa lnga ni bsam gtan bzhi'i sa pa dag yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:61a-29: ci'i phyir gzugs med pa'i sa pa dag med ce na /
T07TD4090.2E:61a-30: re zhig gsum ni med de /
T07TD4090.2E:61a-31: gzugs la dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:61a-32: sems kyi rnam grangs mngon par shes pa yang med de gzugs la stegs bcas nas mngon par bsgrub par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:61a-33: sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa yang med de mthar gyis sngon gyi gnas gzhan rjes su dran pas mngon par 'grub pa'i phyir dang /
T07TD4090.2E:61a-34: gnas dang rus la sogs pa la dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir te /
T07TD4090.2E:61a-35: gzhan gyi sems shes par 'dod pa ni bdag gi lus 'di 'dra ba zhig las sems ni 'di 'dra ba zhig yin no zhes lus dang sems kyi mtshan ma 'dzin cing de bzhin du pha rol bo dag la yang gtod de /
T07TD4090.2E:61a-36: sems shes pa las mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T07TD4090.2E:61a-37: mngon par shes pa mngon par grub na ni gzugs la mi ltos par mngon par shes so //
T07TD4090.2E:61b-0: sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran par 'dod pa ni yid kyi @61b rnam par shes pa 'gags ma thag pa'i mtshan ma bzung nas de'i lugs las bzlog ste /
T07TD4090.2E:61b-1: mtshams sbyor ba'i sems kyi bar du de ma thag pa'i gnas skabs gzhan rnams yin la byed do //
T07TD4090.2E:61b-2: de nas srid pa bar ma'i skad cig ma gcig dran na yang grub pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:61b-3: de bzhin du gzhan gyi yang dran no //
T07TD4090.2E:61b-4: mngon par grub nas ni thod rgal du yang dran no //
T07TD4090.2E:61b-5: sngon nyams su myong ba kho na dran no //
T07TD4090.2E:61b-6: gnas gtsang ma rnams ji ltar dran zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:61b-7: thos pas nyams su myong ba'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:61b-8: gzugs med pa nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes pa na pha rol pa'i rgyud la brten nas skyed de ;
T07TD4090.2E:61b-9: / gzhan dag ni rang gi rgyud la brten nas so //
T07TD4090.2E:61b-10: rdzu 'phrul la sogs pa'i sbyor ba ni yang ba dang /
T07TD4090.2E:61b-12: snang ba yid la byed pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:61b-13: mngon par shes pa lnga po 'di dag ni /
T07TD4090.2E:61b-14: rang dang 'og sa'i yul can yin //
T07TD4090.2E:61b-15: rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par shes pa gang yin pa des sa de 'am 'og mar 'gro ba'am sprul par byed kyi gong du ni ma yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:61b-16: de bzhin du lha'i rna ba'i mngon par shes pas kyang rang gi sa kho na'am sa 'og ma ba'i sgra thos kyi sa gong ma ni ma yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:61b-17: sems kyi rnam grangs mngon par shes pas kyang sa gong ma pa'i sems ni mi shes so //
T07TD4090.2E:61b-18: sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pas kyang mi dran no //
T07TD4090.2E:61b-20: skye ba mngon par shes pas kyang mi mthong ngo //
T07TD4090.2E:61b-21: de nyid kyi phyir gzugs med pa'i sa pa'i sems ni sa gong ma pa yin pa'i phyir /
T07TD4090.2E:61b-23: sngon gyi gnas mngon par shes pa gnyis kyis mi 'dzin to //
T07TD4090.2E:61b-25: ma 'dres pa rnams kyi sbyor bas //
T07TD4090.2E:61b-26: thob bya 'dris pa chags bral bas //
T07TD4090.2E:61b-27: mngon par shes pa tshe rabs gzhan na goms pa rnams ni 'dod chags dang bral bas 'thob bo //
T07TD4090.2E:61b-28: bye brag can rnams ni sbyor bas so //
T07TD4090.2E:61b-29: thams cad kyang sbyong bas bskyed pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:61b-30: gsum pa dran pa nyer gzhag gsum //
T07TD4090.2E:61b-31: sems kyi rnam grangs mngon par shes pa ni sems dang sems las byung ba la dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir /
T07TD4090.2E:61b-34: chos dang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum gyi rang bzhin no //
T07TD4090.2E:61b-35: dang po rdzu 'phrul rna ba mig / mngon par shes pa zhes bya bar sbyar te /
T07TD4090.2E:62a-0: @62a * // rdzu 'phrul dang lha'i rna ba dang lha'i mig gi mngon par shes pa ni gzugs la dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang po yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:62a-1: lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T07TD4090.2E:62a-2: rdzu 'phrul gyi dmigs pa ni phyi'i skye mched bzhi yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:62a-4: lha'i rna ba dang mig gi mngon par shes pa'i dmigs pa ni sgra dang gzugs kyi skye mched yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:62a-6: 'chi 'pho dang skye ba shes pas 'di ltar sems can 'di dag ni lus kyi nyes par spyad pa dang ldan no zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs par shes she na /
T07TD4090.2E:62a-7: de ni des mi shes kyi 'phags pa rnams la de las gzhan pa gang gis na de lta bur shes par 'gyur ba mngon par shes pa'i 'khor du gyur pa'i shes pa skye'o //
T07TD4090.2E:62a-8: lhag ma ni dmigs kyis ma phye ba'i phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi char gyi rang bzhin yin no zhes bya bar grub bo //
T07TD4090.2E:62a-9: mig dang rna ba'i mngon shes ni //
T07TD4090.2E:62a-10: lung du ma bstan lhag rnams dge / lha'i mig dang rna ba'i mngon par shes pa ni lung du ma bstan pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:62a-11: de dag kyang mig dang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang mtshungs par ldan ba'i shes rab yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:62a-12: 'o na de dag ji ltar bsam gtan bzhi'i sa par grub ce na ;
T07TD4090.2E:62a-13: rten gyi dbang gis de'i sa bstan pa'i phyir te /
T07TD4090.2E:62a-14: de'i rten mig dang rna ba ni bsam gtan bzhi'i sa pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:62a-15: yang na bar chad med pa'i lam gyi dbang gis so //
T07TD4090.2E:62a-16: gzhan bzhi ni dge ba dag yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:62a-17: 'o na rab tu byed pa las mngon par shes pa gang zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:62a-18: shes pa dge ba yin no zhes gang bshad pa ji lta bu zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:62a-19: de ni gtso bo'am phal che ba bstan pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:62a-20: mngon par shes pa 'di rnams las //
T07TD4090.2E:62a-24: zag pa zad pa shes pa mngon sum du bya ba rnams ni mi slob pa'i rig pa gsum zhes bya'o //
T07TD4090.2E:62a-25: ci'i phyir de dag kho na yin gyi gzhan dag ma yin zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:62a-27: ma rig pa ni bzlog phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:62a-28: 'di dag gis ni go rims bzhin du sngon gyi mtha' dang /
T07TD4090.2E:62a-30: bar la kun du rmongs pa bzlog par byed do //
T07TD4090.2E:62a-31: de dag las kyang don dam par /
T07TD4090.2E:62b-1: zag pa zad pa mngon du bya ba kho na mi slob pa'i rig pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:62b-3: rgyud las skyes phyir de zhes bya //
T07TD4090.2E:62b-4: gzhan gnyis ni mi slob pa'i rgyud las skyes pa'i phyir mi slob pa zhes bya'i de gnyis ni slob pa yang ma yin la mi slob pa yang ma yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:62b-5: mngon par shes pa 'di dag slob ba'i yin par mi 'dod dam zhe na gang gi phyir slob pa'i rig pa dag ces mi bya zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:62b-6: slob la 'dod de ma rig dang //
T07TD4090.2E:62b-7: bcas rgyud phyir na rig ma bshad //
T07TD4090.2E:62b-8: rgyud ma rig pa dang bcas bzhin du rig pa rnam par gzhag tu ni mi rung ste /
T07TD4090.2E:62b-9: yang ma rig pas zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:62b-10: mngon par shes pa 'di dag las //
T07TD4090.2E:62b-11: dang po gsum pa drug pa ni //
T07TD4090.2E:62b-14: zag pa zad pa'i mngon par shes pa rnams ni go rims bzhin du cho 'phrul gsum yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:62b-15: rdzu 'phrul dang kun rdzob pa dang rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul rnams yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:62b-16: dang po nyid du gdul bya'i yid shen tu 'phrog par byed pa'i phyir cho 'phrul dag yin pa 'am /
T07TD4090.2E:62b-18: bar mar gnas pa rnams kyi yid 'phrog par byed pas na cho 'phrul dag yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:62b-21: rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul ni //
T07TD4090.2E:62b-22: mi 'khrul phyir dang phan pa dang //
T07TD4090.2E:62b-25: rdzu 'phrul dang kun brjod pa dag ni rig sngags kyis kyang /
T07TD4090.2E:62b-27: ghan dha ri zhes bya ba'i rig sngags gang gis na nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang /
T07TD4090.2E:62b-28: rtog byed ces bya ba'i rig sngags gang gis na pha rol gyi sems shes pa yang yod mod kyi yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su bstan pa ni gzhan gyis bya bar mi nus pas mi 'khrul pa'i phyir 'di ni gtso bo yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:62b-29: de gnyis kyis ni gtod pa tsam du zad kyi rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis ni thabs nye bar bstan pa'i sgro nas phan pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:62b-30: yid du 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la sbyor bas 'di nyid mchog yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:62b-31: rdzu 'phrul zhes bya ba 'di ci yin zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:62b-32: bye brag tu smra ba rnams kyis ni /
T07TD4090.2E:62b-34: 'dis 'byor par byed pas na zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T07TD4090.2E:63a-4: de la 'gro ba ni rnam pa gsum ste /
T07TD4090.2E:63a-6: mos pa las byung ba dang /
T07TD4090.2E:63a-10: yid bzhin du mgyogs pas ni yid mgyogs kyi 'gro ba ste /
T07TD4090.2E:63a-11: de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kho na yin gyi gzhan gyi ni ma yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:63a-12: yul thag shin tu ring por yang thugs bskyed pa'i dus kyi byon pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:63a-13: de nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi yul ni bsam gyis mi khyab po zhes bya ba gsungs so //
T07TD4090.2E:63a-14: 'gro ba gzhan dag ni ma bshad kyang sangs rgyas la mnga' bar grub po //
T07TD4090.2E:63a-16: phyin byed mos pa las byung yang //
T07TD4090.2E:63a-17: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams la ni lus phyin byed kyi 'gro ba yang yod de /
T07TD4090.2E:63a-18: bya bzhin du rim gyis lus phyin par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:63a-19: mos pa las byung ba yang yod de /
T07TD4090.2E:63a-20: thag ring po la nye bar mos nas myur du 'gro ba'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:63a-21: sprul pa ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T07TD4090.2E:63a-24: de la re zhig /'dod par gtogs pa'i sprul pa ni /
T07TD4090.2E:63a-26: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sprul pa ni gzugs dang dri dang ro dang reg bya'i skye mched kyi rang bzhin yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:63a-28: bdag dang gzhan gyi lus dang sprul pa'o //
T07TD4090.2E:63a-30: gzugs na spyod pa'i sprul pa ni /
T07TD4090.2E:63a-31: de na dri dang ro med pa'i phyir gzugs dang reg bya'i skye mched gnyis yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:63a-32: de yang 'dod pa'i khams kyi ji lta ba de kho na bzhin du rnam pa gnyis yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:63a-33: 'di ni sprul pa rnam pa bzhi yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:63a-34: gzugs kyi khams na yang de dang 'dra bas mdor bsdu na sprul pa ni rnam pa brgyad yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:63a-35: gzugs kyi khams su skyes pa 'dod pa na spyod pa sprul pa na ji ltar na dri dang ro dag dang mi ldan pa yang yin zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:63a-37: rgyan bzhin du mi ldan no //
T07TD4090.2E:63a-38: gzhan dag na re skye mched gnyis sprul par byed do zhes zer ro //
T07TD4090.2E:63a-39: yang ci mngon par shes pa kho nas sprul pa sprul par byed dam zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:63a-42: 'o na ji lta bu zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:63b-0: sprul sems dag gis de @63b dag kyang ni bcu bzhi'o //
T07TD4090.2E:63b-1: sprul pa'i sems bcu bzhi po de dag ni /
T07TD4090.2E:63b-2: bsam gtan 'bras gnyis nas lnga'i bar rim bzhin /
T07TD4090.2E:63b-3: bsam gtan dang po'i 'bras bu sprul pa'i sems ni gnyis te /
T07TD4090.2E:63b-4: 'dod pa'i khams dang bsam gtan dang po'i sa dag go //
T07TD4090.2E:63b-5: bsam gtan gnyis pa'i 'bras bu ni gsum ste /
T07TD4090.2E:63b-8: gnyis pa'i sa pa dag go //
T07TD4090.2E:63b-9: da bzhin du bsam gtan gsum pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:63b-10: bzhi pa'i sa pa dag kyang bzhi dang lngar spyor bar bya'o //
T07TD4090.2E:63b-11: bsam gtan gyi 'bras bu sprul pa'i sems ni rang gis pa dang sa 'og ma yin par rig par bya'o //
T07TD4090.2E:63b-13: bsam gtan 'og ma'i 'bras bus gong ma'i sprul pa'i sems ni med do //
T07TD4090.2E:63b-14: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sprul pa bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs pa'i 'bras bu ni /
T07TD4090.2E:63b-15: bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa de'i 'bras bu las 'gros kyi sgo nas khyad par du 'phags so //
T07TD4090.2E:63b-17: sprul pa'i sems de dag rnyed pa ni bsam gtan bzhin no //
T07TD4090.2E:63b-18: yang ci sprul pa'i sems kho na las ldang bar 'gyur ram zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:63b-19: de lta bu ni med de /
T07TD4090.2E:63b-22: dag dang rang las skye bar 'gyur te /
T07TD4090.2E:63b-23: sprul pa'i sems ni bsam gtan dag pa pa'am sprul pa'i sems kyi mjug thogs su skye'i gzhan du ni ma yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:63b-25: sprul pa'i sems las kyang bsam gtan dag pa pa dang sprul pa'i sems skye ste /
T07TD4090.2E:63b-26: gzhan du ni ma yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:63b-27: ting nge 'dzin gyi 'bras bu la gnas pa ni yang ting nge 'dzin la ma zhugs par ting nge 'dzin de las ldang ba med do //
T07TD4090.2E:63b-29: rang gi sa pas sprul par byed /
T07TD4090.2E:63b-30: sa gzhan pa'i sprul pa'i sems kyis sa gzhan pa'i sprul par ni mi byed do //
T07TD4090.2E:63b-32: kyang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni rang gi sa pas kyang smrar 'jug go zhes bya ba yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:63b-34: bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa'i sprul pa ni rang gis pa'i sems kho nas smrar 'jug go //
T07TD4090.2E:63b-35: sa gong ma pa ni bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa ste /
T07TD4090.2E:63b-36: yan chad na rnam par rig byed kun nas slong bar byed pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:63b-37: sprul pa mang po rnams smra ba ni ston min sprul pa dang bcas /
T07TD4090.2E:64a-1: pa'i sprul pa ni sprul pa dang bcas te /
T07TD4090.2E:64a-2: smra bas gang gi tshe sprul pa mang po zhig yin pa de'i tshe cig car smra ste /
T07TD4090.2E:64a-3: gcig cig smra bar byed pa na //
T07TD4090.2E:64a-4: sprul pa thams cad smra bar byed //
T07TD4090.2E:64a-5: gcig mi smra bar gyur pa dang //
T07TD4090.2E:64a-6: de dag thams cad smrar mi 'gyur //
T07TD4090.2E:64a-7: zhes tshigs su bcad de 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:64a-8: sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa ni snga phyi ji ltar bzhed par smra'o //
T07TD4090.2E:64a-9: gang gi tshe smrar 'jug pa'i sems yod pa de'i tshe sprul pa'i sems med pa'i phyir sprul pa med na ji ltar smrar 'jug ce na /
T07TD4090.2E:64a-10: byin gyis brlabs nas gzhan 'jug phyir //
T07TD4090.2E:64a-11: gnas par 'dod pas sprul pa byin gyis brlabs nas yid gzhan rnam par rig byed kun nas slong bar byed pas ngag 'jug par byed do //
T07TD4090.2E:64a-12: ci gson po kho na la byin gyi rlabs yod dam /
T07TD4090.2E:64a-13: 'on te shi ba la yod ce na /
T07TD4090.2E:64a-14: shi ba la yang byin gyi rlabs yod /
T07TD4090.2E:64a-15: 'phags pa 'od srungs chen po'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de'i rus pa'i keng rus gnas pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:64a-16: de yang mi brtan la med /
T07TD4090.2E:64a-17: mi brtan pa'i dngos po la ni byin gyi rlabs med de /
T07TD4090.2E:64a-18: 'phags pa 'od srungs chen pos sha la sogs pa byin gyis ma brlabs pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:64a-19: gzhan dag min gzhan dag na re /
T07TD4090.2E:64a-20: shi ba la byin gyi rlabs med kyi /
T07TD4090.2E:64a-21: rus pa'i keng rus gnas pa ni lha'i mthus so zhes zer ro //
T07TD4090.2E:64a-22: ci sems gcig gis sprul pa gcig kho na sprul bar byed dam zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:64a-23: dang por du mas gcig yin te //
T07TD4090.2E:64a-24: bya bar gyur nas bzlog pa'o //
T07TD4090.2E:64a-25: dang po nyid du ni sprul pa'i sems du mas sprul pa gcig sprul par byed do //
T07TD4090.2E:64a-26: mngon par shes pa byang nas ni sems gcig gis sprul pa po ji snyed dod pa du ma sprul par byed do //
T07TD4090.2E:64a-27: yang sprul pa'i sems thams cad lung du ma bstan pa yin nam zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:64a-28: bsgoms las skyes pa lung ma bstan //
T07TD4090.2E:64a-29: bsgoms pa'i 'bras bu gang yin pa de ni nges par lung du ma bstan pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:64a-30: skye ba las skyes rnam gsum mo //
T07TD4090.2E:64a-33: sha za la sogs pa'i skye bas thob pa'i sprul pa'i sems ni dge ba dang /
T07TD4090.2E:64a-35: lung du ma bstan pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:64a-36: de dag gis byas pa'i sprul ba rang dang gzhan gyi lus dang 'brel ba ni sgra med pa'i gzugs can gyi skye mched yin pa'i phyir /
T07TD4090.2E:64b-0: @64b skye mched dug pa yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:64b-1: dbang po dang tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:64b-2: dbang po ni sprul par mi byed do //
T07TD4090.2E:64b-3: ci bsgoms pa las byung ba dang /
T07TD4090.2E:64b-4: skye bas thob pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam pa 'di gnyis kho nar zad dam zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:64b-5: rdzu 'phrul rnam pa gnyis pa de dang /
T07TD4090.2E:64b-7: las las skyes dang rnam pa lnga //
T07TD4090.2E:64b-8: rdzu 'phrul ni mdor bsdu na rnam pa lnga'o zhes brjod de /
T07TD4090.2E:64b-11: gsang sngags las skyes pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:64b-14: dper na nga las nu dang /
T07TD4090.2E:64b-15: srid pa bar ma pa rnams kyi lta bu'o //
T07TD4090.2E:64b-16: lha'i rna ba dang mig tu bshad pa gang yin pa de dag ci lha'i kho na yin nam /
T07TD4090.2E:64b-17: 'on te byang chub sems dpa' dang /
T07TD4090.2E:64b-19: khyim bdag rin po che rnams kyi lta bur lha'i dang 'dra bas lha'i yin zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:64b-20: lha yi mig dang rna ba yin //
T07TD4090.2E:64b-22: bsam gtan sa pa'i gzugs dang ba /
T07TD4090.2E:64b-23: bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs pa'i mig dang rna ba'i thod kor du sgra dang /
T07TD4090.2E:64b-24: snang ba la gtod pa'i sbyor bas bsam gtan gyis pa'i 'byung ba rnams rgyur byas pa'i gzugs dang /
T07TD4090.2E:64b-26: thos pa'i rgyu mngon par 'grub pas bsam gtan gyis pa yin pa'i phyir mig dang /
T07TD4090.2E:64b-27: rna ba de dag ni lha'i kho na yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:64b-28: de gnyis kyang rtag tu brten bcas ma tshang med /
T07TD4090.2E:64b-29: thag ring phra sogs spyod yul can //
T07TD4090.2E:64b-30: lha'i mig dang rna ba ni rtag tu rnam par shes pa dang bcas pa yin pa'i phyir de dang mtshungs pa med do //
T07TD4090.2E:64b-31: zhar ba dang 'on pa med pa'i phyir ma tshang ba yang ma yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:64b-32: gzugs na spyod pa'i sems can bzhin no //
T07TD4090.2E:64b-33: de gnyis kyi yul ni gzugs dang /
T07TD4090.2E:64b-36: bsgribs pa dag kyang yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:64b-38: gang phyir sha yi mig gis gzugs //
T07TD4090.2E:64b-39: thag ring gnas dang bsgribs pa dang //
T07TD4090.2E:64b-40: phra rgyas thams cad mi mthong ba //
T07TD4090.2E:64b-41: de phyir lha yis mthong bar 'dod //
T07TD4090.2E:64b-42: lha'i mig gis thag ji srid cig mthong zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:64b-43: gang gi mig ji lta bu yin ba'o //
T07TD4090.2E:65a-0: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang sangs rgyas rnams ni mngon par 'du byed pa med par stong dang stong gnyis pa @65a * //
T07TD4090.2E:65a-1: dang stong gsum pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ngo //
T07TD4090.2E:65a-3: dgra bcom bse ru ston rnams kyis //
T07TD4090.2E:65a-4: stong gnyis gsum dang grangs med mthong //
T07TD4090.2E:65a-5: nyan thos chen pos kyang mngon par 'du byed pa thams cad kyis lha'i mig gis stong gnyis pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ngo //
T07TD4090.2E:65a-6: bse ru lta bus ni stong gsum pa mthong ngo //
T07TD4090.2E:65a-7: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis ni ji tsam bzhed par 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa gzigs so //
T07TD4090.2E:65a-8: ci rdzu 'phrul kho na skye bas 'thob pa yin nam /
T07TD4090.2E:65a-9: 'on te gzhan yang yin zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:65a-11: lha'i rna ba la sogs pa bzhi yang skye bas 'thob bar bya ba yod mod kyi /
T07TD4090.2E:65a-12: skye bas thob pa ni cung zad kyang mngon par shes pa'i ming mi 'thob bo //
T07TD4090.2E:65a-13: skye bas 'thob pa'i lha'i mig gang yin pa /
T07TD4090.2E:65a-15: srid pa bar ma mi mthong ngo //
T07TD4090.2E:65a-16: srid pa bar ma ni mngon par shes pa'i mig kho nas mthong gi / skye bas thob pa ni ma yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:65a-17: sems shes de ni rnam pa gsum /
T07TD4090.2E:65a-18: skye bas 'thob pa zhes bya bar sbyar te /
T07TD4090.2E:65a-19: pha rol gyi sems shes pa skye bas 'thob pa de ni dge ba dang /
T07TD4090.2E:65a-21: lung du ma bstan pa dang rnam pa gsum yin par rig par bya'o //
T07TD4090.2E:65a-22: gang rtogs dang rig sngags kyis byas pa'ang /
T07TD4090.2E:65a-23: gang yang mtshan ma pa rnams kyis pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang rtog ge ba dang /
T07TD4090.2E:65a-24: gang yang rig sngags kyis byas pa de yang rnam pa gsum yin bar rig par bya ste /
T07TD4090.2E:65a-25: ji ltar bsgoms pa'i 'bras bu dge ba kho na yin pa lta bu ni ma yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:65a-26: pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:65a-27: sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa skye bas thob pa dag gis ni dmyal ba pas ni dang po shes /
T07TD4090.2E:65a-28: ji srid du sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas ma nyen pa de srid du shes so //
T07TD4090.2E:65a-29: 'gro ba gzhan na gnas pas ni rtag tu shes so //
T07TD4090.2E:65a-30: mi la skye bas thob pa med //
T07TD4090.2E:65a-31: mi rnams la ni rdzu 'phrul la sogs pa ji skad bshad pa de skye bas thob pa med do //
T07TD4090.2E:65a-32: 'o na rang bzhin gyis tshe rabs dran pa gang yin pa ji lta bu zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:65a-33: de dag gi de ni las kyi khyad par las skyes pa yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:65a-34: sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa ni rnam pa gsum ste /
T07TD4090.2E:65b-3: chos mngon pa mdzod kyi rnam par bshad pa las ye shes bstan pa zhes bya ba mdzod kyi gnas bdun pa'o //
T07TD4090.2E:65b-4: shes pa'i skabs kyis shes pa'i rang bzhin gyi yon tan rnams ni bshad zin to /
T07TD4090.2E:65b-6: // / rang bzhin gzhan rnams brjod par bya ste /
T07TD4090.2E:65b-7: de lta bas na yon tan thams cad kyi rten yin pa'i phyir dang po kho nar bsam gtan rnams brtsams te /
T07TD4090.2E:65b-8: bsam gtan dag ni rnam pa gnyis //
T07TD4090.2E:65b-9: bsam gtan rnams ni mdor bsdu na skye ba dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i bsam gtan gyi bye brag gis rnam pa gnyis so //
T07TD4090.2E:65b-11: bsam gtan dang po nas bzhi pa'i bar ro //
T07TD4090.2E:65b-12: de la bsam gtan du skye ba rnams ni yang mi brjod de /
T07TD4090.2E:65b-13: 'jig rten bstan pa'i mdzod kyi gnas su /
T07TD4090.2E:65b-14: der skye ba dag rab tu bshad /
T07TD4090.2E:65b-15: ji skad du bshad ce na /
T07TD4090.2E:65b-17: bsam gtan sa ni gsum pa yin //
T07TD4090.2E:65b-18: bzhi pa sa ni brgyad pa yin //
T07TD4090.2E:65b-20: snyoms par 'jug pa'i bsam gtan brjod par bya ste /
T07TD4090.2E:65b-22: snyoms 'jug dge ba rtse gcig pa /
T07TD4090.2E:65b-23: bye brag med par dge ba'i sems rtse gcig pa ni bsam gtan yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:65b-24: ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:65b-25: rjes 'brang bcas na phung po lnga //
T07TD4090.2E:65b-26: 'khor dang bcas na ni phung po lnga'i rang bzhin yin par rig par bya'o //
T07TD4090.2E:65b-27: rtse gcig pa zhes bya ba 'di ci zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:65b-28: dmigs pa gcig pa nyid do //
T07TD4090.2E:65b-29: de lta na ni 'o na sems dmigs pa gcig pa dag kho na ting nge 'dzin yin gyi chos gzhan sems las byung ba ni ma yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:65b-30: sems rnams kho na ting nge 'dzin ma yin gyi gang gis de dag rtse gcig par byed pa'i chos de ting nge 'dzin yin la de nyid rtse gcig pa nyid yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:65b-31: skad cig ma yin pa'i phyir sems thams cad rtse gcig pa ma yin nam /
T07TD4090.2E:65b-32: gal te gnyis pa de las rnam par mi g-yeng ba yin no zhe na ni /
T07TD4090.2E:65b-33: mtshungs par ldan pa la ting nge 'dzin don med pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:65b-34: gang kho na las ting nge 'dzin yin pa de kho na las sems rnams kyi dmigs pa gcig pa nyid du yang ci'i phyir mi 'dod /
T07TD4090.2E:66a-1: mang po pa yin pa'i phyir sems thams cad rtse gcig pa nyid du yang thal bar 'gyur ro //
T07TD4090.2E:66a-3: ting nge 'dzin stobs chung ba'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:66a-4: gzhan dag na re sems rtse gcig pa dag kho na ting nge 'dzin yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:66a-6: lhag pa'i sems kyi bslab pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:66a-7: sems yongs su dag pa'i gtso bo ni bsam gtan bzhi yin no zhes gsungs so zhes zer ro //
T07TD4090.2E:66a-8: bsam gtan zhes bya ba'i don ci zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:66a-9: 'dis sems par byed pas na bsam gtan te /
T07TD4090.2E:66a-10: sems mnyam par bzhag na yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes pa'i phyir rab tu shes par byed ces bya ba'i tha tshig ste /
T07TD4090.2E:66a-11: skad kyi byings 'di ni sems pa'i don yin la /
T07TD4090.2E:66a-12: sems pa yang shes rab yin no zhes grub pa'i mtha' las 'byung ngo //
T07TD4090.2E:66a-13: de lta na ni 'o na ting nge 'dzin thams cad bsam gtan du thal bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:66a-15: phul du phyin pa dang ldan ba la de'i ming du btags pa'i phyir nyi ma bzhin no //
T07TD4090.2E:66a-16: phul du phyin pa dang ldan pa yang gang zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:66a-17: ting nge 'dzin gang yan lag dang ldan pa yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:66a-18: de ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong zung du 'brel par ngang gis 'byung ba'i phyir mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:66a-19: lam sla ba zhes gsungs pas de ni shin tu yang sems par byed do //
T07TD4090.2E:66a-20: nyon mongs pa can ji ltar bsam gtan yin zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:66a-21: log par nges pa sems pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:66a-22: ha cang thal bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:66a-24: de dang mthun pa kho na la de'i ming du btags pa'i phyir te /
T07TD4090.2E:66a-25: sa bon rul pa bzhin no //
T07TD4090.2E:66a-26: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang bsam gtan mi dge ba dag kyang gsungs so //
T07TD4090.2E:66a-27: yang dge ba rtse gcig pa bsam gtan dang po ni ji lta bu /
T07TD4090.2E:66a-28: bzhi pa'i bar ni ji lta bu zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:66a-30: dpyod dang dga' dang bde dang ldan //
T07TD4090.2E:66a-31: dge ba rtse gcig pa bsam gtan dang po ni dpyod pa dang dga' ba dang bde ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa yin no /
T07TD4090.2E:66a-32: dpyod pa smos pas rtog pa yang bshad pa yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:66a-33: lhan cig spyod pa'i phyir du ba dang me bzhin du /
T07TD4090.2E:66a-34: rtog pa med par ni dga' ba dang bde ba dang ldan pa'i dpyod pa med do //
T07TD4090.2E:66a-35: bsam gtan lhag ma gsum ni /
T07TD4090.2E:66b-0: @66b yan lag lnga lnga spangs pa yin //
T07TD4090.2E:66b-1: dge ba rtse gcig pa zhes bya bar sbyar te /
T07TD4090.2E:66b-2: bsam gtan gnyis pa ni dpyod pa spangs la /
T07TD4090.2E:66b-3: dga' ba dang bde ba dang ldan pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:66b-4: gsum pa ni dpyod pa dang dga' ba spangs la bde ba dang ldan pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:66b-5: bzhi pa ni dpyod pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:66b-6: dga' ba dang bde ba spangs pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:66b-7: bsam gtan rnams ji lta ba de bzhin du gzugs med /
T07TD4090.2E:66b-8: rnam pa gang gis she na /
T07TD4090.2E:66b-9: de dag kyang skye ba dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgo nas rnam pa gnyis kyang yin la bzhi yang yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:66b-10: de dag gi yang skye ba rnams ni bshad zin to //
T07TD4090.2E:66b-11: snyoms par 'jug pa'i gzugs med pa rnams ni bye brag med par dge ba'i sems rtse gcig pa'i rang bzhin yin no zhes bya ba'i rnam pa des bshad zin to //
T07TD4090.2E:66b-13: phung po bzhi rjes su 'brang ba'i gzugs med pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:66b-14: 'og ma'i sa dben las skyes pa //
T07TD4090.2E:66b-15: bsam gtan bzhi pa las dben pa las skyes pa ni nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:66b-16: de las dben ba las skyes pa ni rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:66b-17: de las dben ba las skyes pa ni ci yang med pa'i skye mched yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:66b-18: de las dben pa las skyes pa ni 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:66b-19: de ltar na gzugs med pa bzhi yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:66b-20: dben pa zhes bya ba 'di ci zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:66b-21: lam gang gis ni 'og ma las rnam par 'byed pa ste /
T07TD4090.2E:66b-22: 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:66b-23: gzugs med pa de dag kyang /
T07TD4090.2E:66b-24: nyer bsdogs gsum dang bcas par ni //
T07TD4090.2E:66b-25: gzugs kyi 'du shes bshig ces bya //
T07TD4090.2E:66b-26: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi nyer bsdogs ni bsam gtan bzhi pa la dmigs pa'i phyir gzugs kyi 'du shes bshig ces bya ba'i ming mi 'thob bo //
T07TD4090.2E:66b-27: de la ni gzugs kyi 'du shes bshig pa ma yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:66b-28: ma bral zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T07TD4090.2E:66b-29: phung po bzhi zhes gang bshad pa re zhig gzugs med pa dag na gzugs med do zhes bya ba 'di ni bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:66b-30: gal te yod na ji ltar na gzugs med pa rnams brjod par 'gyur /
T07TD4090.2E:66b-31: gzugs cung zad cig yod pa'i phyir te /
T07TD4090.2E:66b-32: cung zad zer ba bzhin no //
T07TD4090.2E:67a-0: re zhig de ni gzugs ji @67a * //
T07TD4090.2E:67a-2: gal te lus dang ngag gi sdom ba tsam zhig go zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:67a-3: de dag med na ji ltar de dag gi sdom par 'gyur /
T07TD4090.2E:67a-4: 'byung ba med par ni 'byung ba las gyur pa mi rung ngo //
T07TD4090.2E:67a-5: gal te zag pa med pa'i sdom pa bzhin no zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:67a-6: ma yin te zag pa dang bcas pa'i 'byung ba yod pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:67a-7: snyoms par 'jug pa la yang de dgag par bshad do //
T07TD4090.2E:67a-8: 'on te lus kyang yod la dbang po gzugs can rnams kyang yod do zhe na ni /
T07TD4090.2E:67a-9: ji ltar na de dag gzugs cung zad yod par 'dod /
T07TD4090.2E:67a-10: gal te bong tshod chung ba'i phyir ro zhe na ni chung ngu'i skye bo gzugs bltar mi snang ba dag la yang thal bar 'gyur ro //
T07TD4090.2E:67a-11: gal te dang ba'i phyir ro zhe na ni /
T07TD4090.2E:67a-12: srid pa bar ma dag dang /
T07TD4090.2E:67a-13: gzugs na spyod pa rnams la yang thal bar 'gyur ro //
T07TD4090.2E:67a-14: gal te gang las ches dang ba med pa yin no zhe na ni /
T07TD4090.2E:67a-15: srid pa'i rtse mo kho na gzugs med pa yin par 'gyur te /
T07TD4090.2E:67a-16: snyoms par 'jug pa bzhin du skye ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:67a-17: bsam gtan du skye ba'i gzugs kyang sa 'og ma'i dbang pos mi zin pa'i phyir de dang yang khyad par ci zhig yod /
T07TD4090.2E:67a-18: gal te gnyis kyi ming ni don dang mthun pa yin gyi gzugs med pa'i khams kyi ni ma yin no zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:67a-19: de la rigs pa ci zhig yod /
T07TD4090.2E:67a-20: gal te tshe dang drod gnyis 'dres par gsungs pa'i phyir dang /
T07TD4090.2E:67a-21: 'dam bu'i shog gnyis bzhin du ming dang gzugs dag phan tshun brten to zhes gsungs pa'i phyir dang //
T07TD4090.2E:67a-22: rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs zhes gsungs pa'i phyir dang /
T07TD4090.2E:67a-23: gzugs nas 'du byed rnams kyi bar las gzhan du rnam par shes pa 'ong ba'am 'gro ba bkag pa'i phyir gzugs med pa dag na gzugs yod pa nyid du grub bo zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:67a-25: dpyad par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:67a-26: re zhig tshe dang drod gnyis 'dres pa nyid du gang gsungs pa 'di ci 'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i tshe las dgongs te gsungs sam /
T07TD4090.2E:67a-27: 'on te thams cad las zhes bya ba dang /
T07TD4090.2E:67a-28: gang yang ming dang gzugs dag phan tshun brten pa nyid du gsungs pa 'di ci 'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa las dgongs te gsungs sam /
T07TD4090.2E:67b-0: 'on te @67b thams cad las zhes bya ba dang /
T07TD4090.2E:67b-1: gang yang rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs zhes gsungs pa 'di ci rnam par shes pa thams cad ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen du gsungs sam /
T07TD4090.2E:67b-2: 'on te ming dang gzugs thams cad rnam par shes pa'i rkyen du gsungs zhes bya ba dang /
T07TD4090.2E:67b-3: gang yang gzugs la sogs pa las gzhan du rnam par shes pa 'ong ba dang 'gro ba bkag par gsungs pa 'di ci de dag thams cad med na de bkag gam /
T07TD4090.2E:67b-4: 'on te 'ga' zhig kyang zhes bya ba 'di dpyad par bya dgos so //
T07TD4090.2E:67b-5: gal te bye brag med par gsungs pa'i phyir dpyad par mi bya'o zhe na ni ha cang thal bar 'gyur te /
T07TD4090.2E:67b-6: tshe med par phyi'i dro ba yang yod par mi 'gyur la /
T07TD4090.2E:67b-7: phyi'i gzugs kyang rnam par shes pa la brten pa nyid du 'gyur te /
T07TD4090.2E:67b-8: khyad par med par 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:67b-9: rnam par shes pa gnas bzhin du zas bzhi gsungs pa'i phyir gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams dag na yang kham du byed pa'i zas yod par thal bar yang 'gyur ro //
T07TD4090.2E:67b-10: gal te kham du byed pa'i zas za ba'i lha rnams las 'das te zhes gsungs pa'i phyir dang /
T07TD4090.2E:67b-11: dga' ba'i zas zhes gsungs pa'i phyir thal bar mi 'gyur ro zhe na ni gzugs med pa dag na yang gzugs yod par thal bar mi 'gyur te /
T07TD4090.2E:67b-12: gzugs med pa rnams ni gzugs rnams las nges par 'byung ba yin no zhes bya ba dang /
T07TD4090.2E:67b-13: gzugs med pa'i rnam par thar pa zhi ba gang dag gzugs rnams las 'das nas zhes bya ba dang /
T07TD4090.2E:67b-14: gzugs can ma yin pa'i sems can dag yod ces bya ba dang /
T07TD4090.2E:67b-15: rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das nas zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:67b-16: gzugs shig yod na ni rang gi gzugs gdon mi za bar 'du shes par byed par 'gyur ro //
T07TD4090.2E:67b-17: gal te sa 'og ma pa'i gzugs rags pa las dgongs te gsungs pa yin no zhe na ni /
T07TD4090.2E:67b-18: kham gyi zas la yang mtshungs so //
T07TD4090.2E:67b-19: bsam gtan rnams kyang sa 'og ma pa las nges par 'byung ba yin pa'i phyir gzugs med par thal bar 'gyur ro //
T07TD4090.2E:68a-0: sa 'og ma pa'i tshor ba la sogs pa las nges par 'byung ba'i phyir tshor ba la sogs pa @68a * //
T07TD4090.2E:68a-1: las kyang nges par 'byung ba yin bar ci'i phyir ma bshad de /
T07TD4090.2E:68a-2: gzugs kyi rnam pa zad par las 'das la tshor ba la sogs pa'i rnam pa las ni ma yin pas de'i phyir gzugs rnams las nges par 'byung ba zhes gsungs so //
T07TD4090.2E:68a-3: srid pas srid pa las nges par mi 'byung bar gsungs pa ni de nyid kyis de las nges par mi 'byung ba'i phyir dang /
T07TD4090.2E:68a-4: thams cad dang gtan du nges par 'byung ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:68a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang bsam gtan dag la ni gang de na gzugs kyi rnam pa yod pa'ang rung rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa'i bar yod pa'ang rung zhes gsungs la /
T07TD4090.2E:68a-6: gzugs med pa dag la ni gang de na tshor ba'i rnam pa yod pa'ang rung rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa'i bar yod pa'ang rung zhes gsungs te /
T07TD4090.2E:68a-7: de dag na gzugs kyi rnam ba zhig yod na ci'i phyir gzugs kyi rnam pa yod pa'ang rung zhes gsungs par mi 'gyur te de lta bas na gzugs med pa na gzugs med do //
T07TD4090.2E:68a-8: de ni ji ltar na de nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi gzugs bskal pa mi nyung ba zhig tu gzugs rgyun chad pa las yang skye bar 'gyur zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:68a-9: gzugs ni sems las skye bar 'gyur //
T07TD4090.2E:68a-10: gzugs ni de'i rnam par smin pa'i rgyus yongs su bsgos pa'i sems 'jug pa rnyed pa las skye bar 'gyur ro //
T07TD4090.2E:68a-11: ji ltar na sems gzugs lam brten par gnas she na /
T07TD4090.2E:68a-13: 'di na de lta bu ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:68a-14: kham gyi zas med par yang gzugs kyi khams na gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
T07TD4090.2E:68a-16: 'di na de lta bu ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:68a-17: ji ltar gnas pa ni sngar bshad zin to //
T07TD4090.2E:68a-21: ci nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la sogs pa de dag nam mkha' la sogs pa kho na la dmigs pa yin pas de'i phyir de skad ces bya'am zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:68a-23: 'o na ji lta bu zhe na /
T07TD4090.2E:68a-25: rnam shes mtha' yas mkha' mtha' yas //
T07TD4090.2E:68a-26: ci yang med ces bya de ltar //
T07TD4090.2E:68a-27: sbyor phyir grangs bzhin du nam mkha' mtha' yas so //
T07TD4090.2E:68a-28: rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so //
T07TD4090.2E:68b-0: @68b ci yang med do zhes de ltar yid la byed cing de dag la rab tu sbyor bas de'i phyir de dag gi ming de dag yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:68b-2: 'du shes med pa yang ma yin pa'o //
T07TD4090.2E:68b-3: 'du shes chung ba'i phyir 'du shes med 'du shes med min zhes bshad de /
T07TD4090.2E:68b-4: de ni 'du shes gsal ba yang ma yin la 'du shes med pa kho na yang ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:68b-5: gal te de la yang 'di ltar 'du shes ni nad do //
T07TD4090.2E:68b-8: 'du shes med pa ni kun du rmongs pa'o //
T07TD4090.2E:68b-10: 'du shes med min skye mched 'di ni zhi ba'o //
T07TD4090.2E:68b-11: 'di ni gya nom pa'o zhes bya bar sbyor ba yod mod kyi ci'i phyir de dag gis de la de ltar 'dzin zhes byas pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:68b-12: 'du shes rnams chung ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'di gdon mi za bar brjod dgos par 'gyur bas de nyid bshad do //
T07TD4090.2E:68b-13: de ltar snyoms 'jug dngos gzhi'i rdzas //
T07TD4090.2E:68b-15: de ltar na 'di dag ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i dngos gzhi'i rdzas brgyad yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:68b-19: de dag las bdun rnam pa gsum //
T07TD4090.2E:68b-20: srid pa'i rtse mo las gzhan pa bdun ni rnam pa gsum yin te /
T07TD4090.2E:68b-21: ro myang ldan dang dag pa dang //
T07TD4090.2E:68b-23: ro myang ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa rnams dang /
T07TD4090.2E:68b-25: zag pa med pa rnams so //
T07TD4090.2E:68b-27: srid pa'i rtse mo ni ro myang ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang /
T07TD4090.2E:68b-28: dag pa pa yin gyi zag pa med pa ni med do //
T07TD4090.2E:68b-30: ro myang mtshungs ldan sred bcas so //
T07TD4090.2E:68b-31: ro myang ba ni sred pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:68b-32: 'jig rten pa yi dge ba ni //
T07TD4090.2E:68b-34: 'jig rten pa'i dge ba snyoms par 'jug pa'i rdzas ni dag pa zhes bya ste /
T07TD4090.2E:68b-35: ma chags pa la sogs pa chos dkar po dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4090.2E:68b-36: ro myang ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa des ci zhig ro myong bar byed ce na /
T07TD4090.2E:68b-38: snyoms par 'jug pa'i rdzas gang 'das ma thag pa de ni des ro myong bar byed de /
T07TD4090.2E:68b-39: ro myang bar bya ba gang yin pa de las ni langs pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:69a-1: byed pa de la ni snyoms par zhugs pa yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:69a-3: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rdzas gang yin pa de ni zag pa med pa yin no snyoms par 'jug pa'i rdzas de dag las bsam gtan rnams kho na yan lag dang ldan pa yin gyi gzugs med pa rnams ni ma yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:69a-4: de la dang po la lnga /
T07TD4090.2E:69a-5: bsam gtan po la yan lag lnga ste /
T07TD4090.2E:69a-7: dga' bas bde dang ting 'dzin rnams //
T07TD4090.2E:69a-12: sems rtse gcig pa nyid de /
T07TD4090.2E:69a-13: de ltar na de dag ni yan lag lnga yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:69a-14: ting nge 'dzin ni yan lag kyang yin la bsam gtan yang yin no //
T07TD4090.2E:69a-15: lhag ma rnams ni yan lag dag yin no zhes grag go //
T07TD4090.2E:69a-16: yan lag bzhi pa'i dmag ji lta bar yan lag lnga'i bsam gtan yang de dang 'dra'o //
T07TD4090.2E:69a-17: gnyis pa la ni yan lag bzhi /
T07TD4090.2E:69a-18: rab dang dad ni dga' la sogs //
T07TD4090.2E:69a-19: bsam gtan gnyis pa la yan lag bzhi ste /
